loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a dairy cow for milk production to earn more income so as to expand her farming.

loans.name: Arfa

texts.en:
Arfa  is a 40-year-old, married woman. She is been involved in the business of cloth trade.  She purchases a variety of cloth at low prices from the city market and sells it in her own town. She has a strong customer base. 

Arfa has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR. She wants to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business to boost her earnings.

loans.use: to buy a greater variety of cloth in different colors for her business to boost her earnings.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to stock up with new products such as nail polish, body creams, powders, and sale products.

loans.name: Delmy Margarita

texts.es:
Delmy, estudio hasta bachillerato, es madre soltera, tiene 3 hijos los cuales asisten a la escuela.

Delmy, trabaja desde la edad de 18 años, su primer empleo fue como ama de casa, en el cual trabajo durante 8 años.- También trabajo como cocinera en un comedor, actualmente tiene un negocio de venta de frutas, verduras y cócteles de conchas, de esa manera ha logrado sacar adelante a sus hijos. 

El crédito será utilizado para comprar más frutas, verduras y conchas para su negocio. 

El sueño de Delmy, es mejorar su vivienda, hacer crecer en su negocio y de esta forma brindarles una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.
texts.en:
Delmy, went to school through secondary school, is a single mother, and has 3 children who go to school.

Delmy has worked since the age of 18. Her first job was as a homemaker, in which she worked for 8 years. She also worked as a cook in a restaurant. Currently she has a business selling fruits, vegetables, and seafood cocktails and this is the way she has managed to get her children ahead. 

The loan will be used to purchase more fruit, vegetables, and seafood for her business.

Delmy's dream is to improve her house, grow her business, and in this way offer her children a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase more fruit, vegetables, and seafood for her business.

loans.name: Grupo Xojolá Group

texts.es:
Julia (la primera del lado izquierdo de la fotografía de blusa color rojo) es una mujer de 28 años de edad, es soltera y vive junto a sus padres en una comunidad de la aldea Xojola. Julia para poder obtener sus ingresos y apoyar a sus padres con los gastos de la casa se dedica al cultivo y venta de café, con esta labor lleva 8 años de realizarlo. Pero a pesar de ser una joven para ella no es ningún impedimento  trabajar en el campo, es por ello que ahora le preocupa mucho porque en estos días no cuenta con dinero suficiente para darle el mantenimiento de su cultivo de café, es el motivo que tiene para solicitar un crédito para comprar sus insumos agrícolas.
El gran sueño de Julia es poder comprar 10 cuerdas de terreno para incrementar su cultivo de café.
texts.en: Julia (the first to the left side of the picture, with a red blouse) is a 28 year old woman. She is single and lives with her parents in a community of the town of Xojola. Julia makes a living growing and selling coffee to be able to get her income and support her parents with the household expenses. She has been doing this work for 8 years. Despite being a young woman, for here there is no impediment to working in the fields. For that reason, she is very worried because these days she can not count on enough money to maintain her coffee crops. That is her motive for asking for a loan to buy agricultural supplies. Julia's big dream is to be able to buy 10 acres of land to increase her coffee cultivation.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies.

loans.name: Sirly María

texts.es: Sirly es una auténtica emprendedora que llevo su sueño de ser una empresaria independiente a la realidad.  Todo inició cuando venía de regreso a Colombia, puesto que se encontraba en el vecino país de Venezuela en compañía de su novio, quien hoy en día es su cónyuge, ella utilizó unos ahorros para comprar mercancías varias; prendas de vestir y calzado, así mismo  productos alimenticios como carnes frías y pescados. Su talento para la docencia no pasó desapercibido, a todos los compradores de la oferta de productos que trajo de Venezuela, les propuso el servicio de refuerzo escolar para sus hijos.  En la actualidad cuenta con cinco años de experiencia en estas labores y una clientela bastante consolidada que realiza sus compras en su gran mayoría a crédito. Sirly desea tener mayor capital en su negocio, para incrementar las ventas y para ello está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en surtido de calzado, prendas de vestir, carnes frías y material didáctico en el refuerzo escolar.  Sirly es madre de dos hijos a quienes desea ofrecer bienestar fruto de su trabajo y en compañía de su cónyuge residen en un barrio del municipio de Barranquilla.
texts.en: Sirly is a real entrepreneur who makes her dream of being an independent businesswoman a reality. Everything started when she returned to Colombia, since she had been in the neighboring country of Venezuela with her boyfriend, who is now her husband. She used some savings to purchase a variety of merchandise such as clothing and footwear, as well as foods such as cold meats and fish. Her talent for teaching didn't go unnoticed; to all the buyers of the products she brought to Venezuela, she offered tutoring services for their children. Currently, she has five years of experience in these jobs and a fairly strong customer base which purchases largely on credit. Sirly wants to have more capital in her business, to increase her sales and for this she is applying for her first Kiva loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, which she will invest in an assortment of footwear, clothing, cold meat and teaching materials for tutoring. Sirly is the mother of two children to whom she wants to offer well-being, the fruit of her labor. Along with her husband, they live in a neighborhood in the municipality of Barranquilla.

loans.use: to invest in an assortment of footwear, clothing, cold meats and teaching materials for tutoring.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Patrick is a young man living in a town outside of Nairobi. He attended iSmart's sales and marketing training and has taken up a job as sales agent.

Patrick sells life-improving products like solar lamps and clean cookstoves. These clean cookstoves have a more efficient design that reduces charcoal consumption, saving customers money and saving the environment. These cookstoves also reduce the toxic smoke emissions and are better for the customer's health.

Please help Patrick earn a living and bring these beneficial products to families in his community.

loans.use: to pay for clean cookstoves to sell and earn an income.

loans.name: Ricarda

texts.es: Doña Ricarda es originaria de Siuna vivió en este lugar hasta los seis años de edad con sus padres,  a los 10 años se fue a vivir a Matagalpa con su madrina se fue con el propósito de ir a estudiar. Luego de cumplir los 15 años regresó donde su madre a Matagalpa, al cumplir mayoría de edad se casó y ya tiene aproximadamente 38 años de vivir con su esposo y han procreado 4 hijos todos ya están mayores y comenta que ya la hicieron abuela. Doña Ricarda ha luchado mucho para mantener sus tierras, en donde siembra granos básicos y también tiene sus animales. Con mucho esfuerzo hace un tiempo doña Ricarda compró un panel solar pero actualmente le está dando fallas, es por eso que quisiera un préstamo para la compra de un sistema solar que esté en buenas condiciones y así poder vivir mejor con su familia y sus nietos  que ya están estudiando y ocupan la luz para alumbrarse y hacer las tareas, doña Ricarda también ocupa luz cuando se levanta de madrugada para hacer sus labores en la simebra y de la casa. Doña Ricarda se sentiría muy agradecida si le brindan la oportunidad de adquirir este préstamo para la compra de este Sistema Solar.
texts.en: Ricarda is from Siuna, she lived in this place to the age of six with her parents. At age 10 she went to live in Matagalpa with her godmother. She went with the goal of going to school. When she turned 15, she came back to her mother in Matagalpa, when she became an adult, she got married and now has lived with her husband for approximately 38 years and has 4 children who are now all adults and says that they made her a grandmother already. Ricarda has struggled a lot to keep her land, where she grows basic grains and also has her animals. With a lot of effort, a while ago Ricarda purchased a solar panel to be able to live better with her family and her grandchildren who are now students and use the light to do their homework. Ricarda also uses light when she gets up in the early morning to do her planting work and take care of the house. Ricarda would be very grateful if the opportunity was offered to her to get this loan to purchase this solar energy system.

loans.use: to install a 150 solar electricity system, a controller and a Trojan battery of 105 amp-hours.

loans.name: Rosa Mirian

texts.es:
Rosa, de 32 años de edad, es una mujer luchadora, estudió hasta segundo grado, porque sus padres le enseñaron a trabajar desde temprana edad, está acompañada, su pareja es un hombre trabajador que es empleado en una hacienda ganadera cercana a su comunidad, ellos viven junto a sus tres hijos.

Rosa, todos los días desde tempranas horas de la mañana, alista su mercadería de ropa para todas las edades y sexos, y sale a vender junto con su hermana a las comunidades más cercanas, dicho comercio lo realiza desde hace cinco años, pues anteriormente se había dedicado a los oficios domésticos.

El préstamo que está solicitando es para instalar la luz eléctrica en su casa, porque no cuenta con ese beneficio y también invertirá en más mercadería para vender, pues ya se le está acabando.

Rosa, sueña con tener electrodomésticos en su casa, pues siempre a soñado con tenerlos; tambien sueña con que sus hijos se superen y lleguen a ser profesionales.
texts.en:
Rosa is a 32 year old, hard-working woman. She studied up to the second grade because her parents taught her to work from a young age. She has a partner and he is a hard-working man who is employed in a cattle ranch in the community. They live together with their three children.

Rosa prepares her merchandise, clothes for all ages and sexes, in the early hours of the morning and goes out selling with her sister in the nearby communities. She has been doing this job for 8 years, having done domestic work previously. 

The loan she is requesting is for the installation of electricity in her home because she does not currently enjoy this utility, she will also invest in more merchandise to sell because she is running out.

Rosa yearns to have household appliances in her home as she has always dreamed of having them. She also dreams that her children will overachieve and go on to become professionals.

loans.use: instal electricity in her home and purchase merchandise to sell

loans.name: Andrea Elizabeth

texts.es: Andrea tiene 23 años de edad, ella es casada y tiene una hija de 4 años, ella vive en el campo y se dedica a la crianza y comercialización de animales, Andrea y su esposo se dedican a trabajar al jornal de trabajo en el campo, con el dinero del crédito va a comprar chanchos, la aspiración de Andrea es mejorar su negocio y trabajar duro para en un futuro comprarse una casita para mejorar la calidad de vida de su hija.
texts.en: Andrea is 23 years old. She is married and has a 4-year-old daughter. She lives in the countryside and works raising and selling animals. Andrea and her husband work as day laborers in the countryside. With the money from the loan, she will purchase pigs. Andrea's aspiration is to improve her business and work hard to, in the future, purchase a small house to improve her daughter's quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Jorge Orlando

texts.es: Jorge es un señor de buen carácter, es casado y tiene 2 hijos de 9 y 10 años de edad, y se encuentran asistiendo a la escuela, vive en una casas por la que paga arriendo y ahí tiene un espacio donde puede tener chanchos, Jorge juntamente con su esposa se dedican al jornal de trabajo del campo, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de chanchos, lo que Jorge aspira es mejorar su negocio y tener una buena ganancia para de ahí ayudarse con los gastos de educación que tiene de sus hijos, para que ellos se formen como profesionales.
texts.en: Jorge is a man of good character. He is married and has 2 children, ages 9 and 10, and they are students. He lives in a house he rents and there he has space where he can have pigs. Jorge, along with his wife, works as a day laborer in the countryside. The loan will be invested in the purchase of pigs. Jorge aspires to improve his business and have good earnings to then help with his children's education costs, so that they become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase pigs.

loans.name: Christiana

texts.en:
Christiana, who is 67 years old, went to school through sixth grade. She is single and stays alone. She is employed in a business that sells oxygen gas and bags.

Christiana has had a little shop in the market and she sell bags and oxygen gas. Her house is not too far from the market.

She needs the loan to buy more bags and oxygen which she will sell to customers. With this investment, she hopes to earn more than she did previously.

She needs a loan amount of GHS 2,000 to increase her products and improve her life.

loans.use: To buy more bags and oxygen which she will sell to customers.

loans.name: Faith

texts.en:
Faith is a new sales agent for iSmart Kenya, an organization with a mission to create jobs for youth and women in slums. She has completed iSmart's sales and marketing training and is beginning to work as a door-to-door sales agent in Nairobi's slum communities.

iSmart's best-selling product is the clean cookstoves, which have an efficient design that saves customers money by reducing the amount of charcoal needed by half. These cookstoves also reduce the toxic smoke emissions and are better for the customer's health as well as the environment.

Please help Faith earn a living and bring these beneficial products to others in her community.

loans.use: to pay for clean cookstoves to sell in informal settlements in Nairobi.

loans.name: Shama

texts.en:
Shama is 45 years old, a married woman. She is a mother of eight children. She has been doing a business of animal purchase and sales for many years. Shama is motivated to provide her family with the basic necessities of life through her work.

Now she has requested a loan of 45,000 PKR. She wants to use this loan amount to purchase more cattle for selling in the market.

She desires of improving her standard of living thorough all her efforts.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle to sell in the market.

loans.name: Bushra

texts.en:
Bushra is a 51-year-old married woman. She does hand embroidery. She makes beautiful patterns for the people of her community. Her designs are much in demand and she has managed to build a clientele that allows her to contribute to the expenses of her home.

To help her to continue her operations, she has requested a loan of 40,000 PKR to buy spools of thread in different colors along with packs of beads, sequins and stones for its embellishment; this will allow her to cater to more customers consistently.

She is hopeful to get an increase in her income by targeting more customers. She dreams of her bright future and desires to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy spools of thread in different colors, along with packs of beads, sequins and stones for its embellishment; this will allow her to cater to more customers consistently.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase bricks, cement, sand, iron and pay for labor for the construction of a perimeter wall

loans.name: Hisravjon

texts.en:
Hisravjon is a careful and supportive man. He was born in the southern part of Tajikistan in 1985 and he is living in remote district with his family. He is married and has one child. His wife is a teacher and he is a business man, selling fruits to the domestic market. His business is well and his income is enough to ensure his family's livelihood. 

He found that his son is sick and took him to the medical clinic. He does not have money to pay for medical services and medicines for his son. He appealed to IMON asking for a loan to pay the medical clinic. He hopes to be understood and supported by KIVA lenders.

loans.use: to pay for medicines and medical services for his son.

loans.name: Ricardo

texts.es: Ricardo  tiene  37 años, vive en una comunidad de Santa Bárbara, Honduras,  es una persona muy emprendedora y  se dedica a la agricultura de café y piña, desde  hace 7 años ;  vive con su esposa y tienen dos hijos , uno de ellos está en la escuela. Su esposa Sonia se dedica a la venta de insumos para el hogar, tiene una mini farmacia y vende cosméticos para damas; Ricardo  está  solicitando financiamiento a Soluz para adquirir un sistema Frezer solar, para incorporar productos que necesitan ser refrigerados a su negocio,   los cuales no han podido ofrecer  a sus clientes porque en su localidad no hay servicio de Energía Eléctrica.  Ricardo y su esposa   están felices de poder brindar a los miembros de su comunidad otra variedad de productos y además a través de esto podrán obtener más ingresos, lo cual les permitirá darle una mejor educación a sus hijos y un mejor estilo de vida a su familia.
texts.en: Ricardo is 37 years old, lives in a community in Santa Bárbara, Honduras, is a very enterprising person and has worked growing coffee and pineapple for the past 7 years.  He lives with his wife and has two children. One of them is in school. His wife, Sonia, works selling household supplies. She has a mini-pharmacy and sells cosmetics for women. Ricardo is asking for a loan from Soluz to get a solar-powered freezer system to incorporate some products that need to be refrigerated into her business, which she has not been able to offer her customers because there isn't any electrical service in their area. Ricardo and his wife are happy to offer members of their community another variety of products and, in addition, through this they will be able to get more income, which will allow them to give their children a better education and their family a better standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase a solar-powered freezer which will generate more income in his business and will give him the opportunity to provide better customer service.

loans.name: María Del Carmen

texts.es: María reside en un barrio del municipio de Malambo y desde la comodidad de su hogar ofrece almuerzos corrientes a vecinos y transeúntes del lugar.  Ella necesitaba tener una fuente de ingresos para solventar gastos en su hogar y gracias a su buena sazón, consideró que podría deleitar a los residentes del sector.  Con un pequeño capital realizó compras de víveres y empezó preparando una cantidad moderada de platos, hoy en día sus comensales son cada vez más y para poder responder a la creciente demanda, está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, que invertirá en víveres; arroz, carnes, verduras, entre otros. Ella es madre de cuatro hijos a quienes ofrece bienestar y desea una mejor calidad de vida para su familia. Su meta a futuro es mejorar la imagen del negocio para atraer más clientes.
texts.en: Maria resides in a neighborhood in the municipality of Malambo and from the comfort of her home provides specials during the lunch hour to neighbors and visitors of the area. She needed to have a source of income to pay for expenses at home. Thanks to her good hand in the kitchen, she considered that she might delight the residents in her area. With a small capital she purchased food supplies and began preparing a moderate quantity of entrees. Today, her diners are more each time and in order to respond to the increasing demand, she is applying for her first credikiva through the Mario Santo Domingo foundation, which she will invest in food supplies; rice, meat, and vegetables among others. She is the mother of four children who she provides sustenance for and she wishes a better quality of life for her family. Her goal in the future is to improve the look of her business to attract more clients.

loans.use: invest in food supplies; rice, meat and vegetables among others.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase metal sheeting, wood, pins, etc. to be able to take up construction again on the bedroom.

loans.name: Margarita

texts.es:
MARGARITA TIENE 51 AÑOS , SEPARADA, CON 1 HIJA A SU CARGO Y CON UNA NIETA EN SU CASA, VIVE EN UNA COMUNIDAD UBICADA A 48 KMS DE LA PROVINCIA DE CHICLAYO, REGION LAMBAYEQUE, COSTA NORTE DE PERÚ.

mARGARITA ES CONOCIDA EN EL MEDIO POR LAS VENTAS DE DESAYUNOS Y ALMUERZOS,EN SU MISMO DOMICILIO, DESDE HACE MÁS DE 05 AÑOS, CON MUY BUENAS REFRERENCIAS PERSONALES Y LABORALES, SOLICITA EL CREDITO PARA LA COMPRA DE UNA COCINA INDUSTRIAL Y UNA MAYOR CANTIDAD DE INSUMOS PARA LA PREPARACION DE SUS ALIMENTOS, DE ESTA MANERA PODRÁ ATENDER MAYOR CANTIDAD DE CLIENTES LO QUE LE GENERARÁ MAYORES INGRESOS Y POR ENDE PODRÁ MEJORAR SU CALIDAD DE VIDA.
texts.en:
Margarita is 51 years old, separated, with one daughter in her care and with a granddaughter in her house. She lives in a community located 48 km from the province of Chiclayo, Lambayeque region, on the northern coast of Peru.

Margarita is known by her sales of breakfasts and lunches in her own house for over 5 years, with good personal and work references. She asks for the loan to purchase an industrial range and a larger quantity of supplies to prepare her foods. In this way, she will be able to serve a larger number of customers, which will generate more income with the end of being able to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase an industrial range and a larger quantity of supplies to prepare her food.

loans.name: Reina Arely

texts.es:
Reina, de 29 años de edad, es viuda, estudio hasta sexto grado, tiene un hijo de 9 años de edad que asiste a tercer grado y vive en casa de sus padres.

Reina, se dedica  a los oficios domésticos, pero también realiza trabajos de agricultura con su padre, siempre le ha gustado trabajar en el campo, engordar cerdos, comprar y vender ganado.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar vacas, porque en esta época se puede hacer un buen negocio con la venta de ganado o también con la venta de lácteos.

En un futuro Reina, sueña con obtener un nuevo crédito para hacerle mejoras en la vivienda de sus padres.
texts.en:
Reina is 29 years old, and a widow.  She attended school until the sixth grade.  She has a 9-year-old son who is in the third grade, and she lives in her parents' home.

Reina dedicates herself to household work, but she also carries out agricultural work with her father.  She has always enjoyed working in the fields, fattening pigs, and buying and selling livestock.

She needs the loan in order to buy cows because at this time she is able to do good business with the sale of livestock, as well as with the sale of dairy products.

For the future, Reina dreams of having another loan in order to make improvements to her parents' house.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase vegetables in larger quantity.

loans.name: Mirian De Jesus

texts.es:
Miriam, de 49 años de edad, estudio hasta segundo grado, porque en su tiempo de juventud no tenían los recursos necesarios, está soltera, vive junto a su hijo que ya es mayor de edad. 

Miriam, tiene una pequeña tienda en su casa desde hace mucho tiempo. 

Miriam, utilizara el crédito para comprar mercadería para ampliar la tienda.

En el futuro planea hacer más grande su casa para tener espacio para sus nietos.
texts.en:
Miriam is 49 years old, and only attended school until the second grade because in her youth they did not have the necessary resources.  She is single and lives with her son who is an adult.  

Miriam has had a small store in her house for a long time.  She will use the loan to buy merchandise to expand her store.  In the future, she plans to make her house larger in order to have space for her grandchildren.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to expand her store.

loans.name: Ameen

texts.en:
Ameen is a 44-year-old married woman and the mother of six children. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing.

For many years, Ameen has done business purchasing and selling animals with the help of her husband. Her business has provided her family with a decent life.

Ameen has requested a loan of 55,000 PKR. She intends to use this loan to purchase more baby goats and calves to cater to more customers. She is hopeful that her business will generate greater revenue in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats and calves to cater to more customers.

loans.name: Sol Naciente Group

texts.es:
Raquel cambió de actividad, debido a problemas de salud decidió dejar la venta de ropa a su hermana, y abrió un puesto de venta de comida en las afueras de su domicilio (la primera de la derecha, viste chompa negra). El crédito que obtuvo lo invirtió en la compra de ropa de segunda mano por mayor, el pago de sus cuotas fue puntual porque no tuvo problemas. Debido a la necesidad de trabajar en su domicilio, formó una banca de personas con negocio como; venta de ropa de segunda mano, panadería, venta de lácteos, venta de ropa de bebé, comercio de cosméticos, venta de empanadas y venta de artesanía en cuero, para solicitar un préstamo y mejorar sus negocios. Su negocio es la venta de comida tradicional, como; majadito (carne deshidratada, arroz, huevo frito y plátano frito), locro (sopa de carne deshidratada, carne cortada en pedacitos, yuca y huevo), Plato Cruceño (preparado en base a plátano frito, arroz y huevos fritos), “cambié de actividad por motivos de salud, vendí toda la ropa por completo y ahora trabajo desde mi hogar haciendo lo que siempre hice desde muy niña, cocinar…” comenta. Labor que realiza todos los días de la semana para la hora de almuerzo en las afueras de su hogar, con un par de sombrillas y unas sillas para sentarse. La ventaja de su negocio es que las ventas son diarias, la desventaja es la falta de capital para la compra de cocina, garrafa de gas, ollas, etc. Su sueño es construir un techo en su casa para utilizarlo como restaurante, para que sus hijos vendan con ella, Ella desea realizar la compra de cocina, garrafa de gas, ollas, etc, para terminar de armar su nuevo emprendimiento. Esta es la 2 secuencia de préstamos con la institución en 2 años que viene realizando esta actividad.
Es por esos motivos que Raquel solicita un préstamo para la compra de ropa de muebles y enseres de comedor para terminar de instalar su puesto de comida.
texts.en:
Due to problems with her health, Raquel has changed her work. She left her clothing sales business to her sister, and opened a food sales stall just outside her home. She is the first one on the right, wearing the black sweater. 

The loan she obtained was used to buy second hand clothing wholesale. She didn't encounter any problems, so her repayments were punctual. Due to the need to work from home, she set up a bank of business people with businesses such as second a bakery, sales of second hand clothing, dairy products, baby clothing, cosmetics, empanadas, and leather handicrafts, to request a loan and improve their respective businesses. 

Her business is in traditional food sales, such as majadito (dried meat, rice, fried egg and fried banana), locro (stew of dried meat, chopped up meat, yucca and egg), Plato Cruceño (meal made of fried banana, rice and fried egg). She says "I changed activity due to health reasons, I sold all of the clothing and now I work from home doing what I have been doing since I was a little girl, cooking". 

She works every day of the week for lunchtime outside her home, with a couple of parasols and some chairs to sit on. The advantage of her business is that sales are every day, the disadvantage is the lack of money to buy a stove, gas cylinder, pans, etc. Her dream is to build a roof on her house to use it as a restaurant, so that her children can sell with her. She wishes to buy a stove, gas cylinder, pans, etc. to fully supply her new undertaking. This is her second loan with the institution in the two years she has been working in this area.

This is why Raquel is requesting a loan to buy table linens and basic kitchen equipment to finish setting up her food stall.

loans.use: to buy table linens, and basic kitchen equipment to finish setting up her food stall.

loans.name: Arus

texts.en:
Arus is 31 years old and married with a school-aged son and daughter. She lives in Sevan City in the Gegharkunik region. With the help of her husband, Arus is engaged in farming and takes care of cows, calves, a bull, lambs, and sheep. This young woman is a very skilled farmer and she sells a lot of milk, macun (national dairy-product), curd, beef, and mutton to her regular customers. 

Arus is requesting a loan to buy a cow and fodder for her cattle. If she had a bigger farm, she would manage to have more income and earn a better living for her nice family as well. Arus will be very happy if Kiva lenders support her to buy a cow and fodder.

loans.use: to buy a cow and fodder for her cattle

loans.name: Cruz

texts.es:
Cruz es un gran hombre, él trabaja con mucho esmero en el campo donde día a día y de sol a sol se sacrifica para obtener sus ingresos y mantener a su familia, Cruz confía en ADICLA por ser una institución que le brinda todo su apoyo, él cuenta que gracias al crédito puedo comprar sus semillas de zanahoria y papa, a Dios gracias le fue muy bien y obtuvo muy buena ganancia que hasta logro construir dos cuartos. Cruz es uno de los agricultores que su visión es superarse, es por ello que nuevamente se ve a la necesidad de solicitar un crédito que lo invertirá en la compra de semillas de papa y fertilizantes  para incrementar su cultivo.
El gran sueño de Cruz es poder comprar más terrenos y construir mas casa.
texts.en: Cruz is a great man. With much dedication, he works in the field, where from day to day and sun to sun he sacrifices to obtain income and support his family. Cruz trusts ADICLA because it is an institution that offers hi all of its support. He says that thanks to the loan he was able to buy his carrot and potato seeds, and thank God it went well for him and he obtained very good profits and he even built two rooms. Cruz is one of the farmers with a vision of getting ahead. That is why he again needs to ask for a loan, which he will invest in buying potato seeds and fertilizer to increase his crop. Cruz's big dream is to be able to buy more land and build a house.

loans.use: to buy potato seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Jose Arnoldo

texts.es:
José, de 34 años de edad, está soltero, estudio hasta tercer grado. 

José, desde temprana edad se dedica al trabajo de la agricultura y la ganadería.

El préstamo lo utilizara  para comprar ganado.

En el futuro planea hacer una casa y tener su propia familia.
texts.en:
José, is 34 years old. He is single and went to school up to the third grade. Since an early age, José has worked in agriculture and ranching.

He will use the loan to buy cattle. 

Iin the future, he plans on building a house and having his own family.

loans.use: to buy cattle.

loans.name: Saira

texts.en:
Saira is a 25-year-old married woman. She has been the beauty parlor business for many years.

Saira offers many services to her customers such as makeup, hair styling and facials. Through her high-quality services she has become very famous in her street.

In order to meet with the increasing demands of her customers, Saira is interested in buying more variety of cosmetics products for the parlor. That is why she has availed a Murabaha loan of 25,000 PKR to buy hair care products, skin products and hair rollers to treat more customers, so she can gain profit to build her own house.

loans.use: to buy hair care products, skin products and hair rollers to treat more customers so she can gain profit to build her own house.

loans.name: Shazia

texts.en:
Shazia is a 24-year-old married woman and a mother of two children. She is very motivated to provide them a beautiful life with good education, food and clothing.

Shazia has been doing business purchasing and selling animals with the help of her husband (also shown in the photo) for many years. Her business has provided her family with a decent life.

Shazia has requested a loan of 35,000 PKR. She intends to use this loan to purchase more baby goats and calves to cater to more customers. She is hopeful that her business will generate greater revenue in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more baby goats and calves to cater to more customers.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: la joven a quien se le ha pixeleado la cara por tener 18 años de edad y vivir en zona de alto riesgo, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos (maíz y frijol), tiene 4 años de dedicarse a esa actividad y con lo que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, la joven vive en casa propia con sus padres, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, etc. y así mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
The young woman, who's face has been blurred as she is aged 18 and living in a high risk area, work growing grains (corn and beans). 

She has been doing this job for four years, and is able to pay some of the household costs with the money she earns. 

She lives in her own home together with her parents. She is requesting this loan to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control etc. to increase her income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers, compost, pest control etc.

loans.name: Jenny

texts.es: Doña Jenny se dedica a la venta de comidas locales, ella necesita un préstamo de ₡ 1 050 000 para la compra de equipo y utensilios necesarios para dar un mejor servicio a su clientela, ya que sus ingresos dependen de esta actividad.
texts.en: Jenny sells local food. She needs a loan of  ₡1,050,000 to buy equipment and tools she needs to give her customers a better service, because her income depends on this activity.

loans.use: to buy equipment and tools to make food.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy livestock to graze.

loans.name: Vaghtang

texts.en:
Vaghtang is a musician from Goris town. He lives with his parents, grandmother, wife and 3-year-old son. Vaghtang works in the Goris town theater as an audio operator and he also plays at weddings and birthday parties. Vaghtang needs loudspeakers in his work, but because of his family's daily expenses, has not been able to save money to purchase them. 

Vaghtang is requesting a loan to purchase loudspeakers to provide musical performances for different events. His loan has been approved within the framework of joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. This loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. Your help is very important for Vaghtang and he hopes for your support.

loans.use: to purchase loudspeakers to provide musical performances for different events

loans.name: Astghik

texts.en: Astghik is 57 years old and she lives with her son in Ddmashen village of the Gegharkunik region. For many years, Astghik used to work at the city’s textile factory as a tailor. Since this factory is now closed, Astghik is unemployed and she is busy with farming and agriculture. Astghik’s husband is in the Russian Federation and from there he sends money for his family. On the farm, Astghik has cows, pigs, piglets and chickens. She mentions that swine breeding brings good income and so does the land cultivation, especially potato and garlic cultivation. Astghik sells all her farm products, such as milk, pork, eggs, potatoes and garlic, locally to her neighbors or to re-sellers. Astghik’s son is employed but he manages to help his mother, particularly in agricultural works. Astghik asked for this loan as she wants to buy a pig and fodder for her farm cattle, and she will use this loan for garlic cultivation as well.

loans.use: to buy a pig, fodder for her farm cattle and  garlic cultivation

loans.name: Jean-Luc

texts.en:
Jean-Luc comes from the Nyamagabe district of Rwanda. His mother is a nurse and he has a brother and sister. Jean-Luc likes a simple life filled with humor and he works hard to achieve his goals. Jean-Luc believes that his strength is collaboration. He was accepted by Kepler from over 6,000 applicants, which shows both his motivation and ability. His high school results, standardized testing, and a personal interview were all considered in the application process. 

Jean-Luc is requesting a loan to pay for a laptop that is required for his US college degree. He plans to major in business and communications at Kepler and will graduate with an associate’s and bachelor’s degree. Jean-Luc will be the first in his family to gain these degrees. After graduation, he wants to be a manager in a manufacturing company. He believes he will continue to develop strengths such as integrity and critical thinking while at school. In the future, he wants to support his family and sponsor activities which benefit the community.

loans.use: to pay for a laptop required for his US college degree

loans.name: Muhammad

texts.en:
Muhammad is a 28-year-old single man from Dier Al-Balah in the besieged Gaza Strip, where unemployment is very high. He has been transporting goods using his rickshaw for the past year. Muhammad buys products wholesale and resells them for a small profit margin.

Muhammad has taken out a USD loan from FATEN, which will help him to buy a new rickshaw.

Muhammad’s loan will enable him to buy more inventory and goods to resell, and eventually increase the size of his business and his income.

loans.use: to buy a new rickshaw.

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en:
Hassan is a 22-year-old single man from Khan Younis, which is both a city and a Refugee Camp in city, Palestine The besieged Gaza Strip, where unemployment is very high. Hassan works as a farmar where he earned low income He decided to create new source of income. 

Hassan has taken out a USD loan from FATEN, which will help him to buy a rickshaw and transport a goods between a traders. Hassan’s loan will enable him to buy a rickshaw, and eventually increase the size of his business and his income.

loans.use: to buy a rickshaw and transport a goods between a traders

loans.name: Sehar

texts.en:
Sehar is 26 years old, married woman, with 3 children. She along with her husband (also shown in the photo) deals in a business selling animals such as baby goats.  They have now become popular in the community and earn good amount of income to run their household activities. Sehar  fully supports and assists her husband with his work. 

Now, she has requested for a loan of 30000 PKR. She wants to use this loan amount  to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market. She desires of improving her standard of living thorough all her efforts.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market

loans.name: Sahakanush

texts.en:
Sahakanush, her husband, daughter and granddaughter live in Gyumri town. She works as a cook in a restaurant and also makes different cookies in the separate baking room in her house. Sahakanush is very professional and skilled and received many orders during the month. 

She asks this loan to purchase a new and bigger oven, special plates for cookies and to improve sanitary conditions in the baking room. 

Sahakanush has now been approved for a loan within the framework of joint initiative between Kiva and SEF international. The start-up loan program provides business start-up loans with soft conditions to informal businesses that do not have access to credit products. Your help is very important for Sahakanush and her bakery business, so she hopes for your support.

loans.use: pay for a new and bigger oven, special plates for cookies and to improve sanitary conditions in the baking room

loans.name: Ginovel De Jesus

texts.es: Don Ginovel de 61 años de edad vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica desde hace varios años al cultivo de maíz y frijol, vende sus productos en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su casa, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de fertilizantes, abonos, controles de plagas, herbicidas, fertilizantes, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra le fotografía y así poder continuar con su trabajo.
texts.en: Ginovel is 61 years old. He lives in his own home with his family group. For several years, he has grown corn and beans. He sells his products in the different markets close to his home. With the profits he obtains, he is able to pay for some household expenses. He is asking for a loan to buy fertilizer, compost, pest control, herbicide, etc., and improve the land seen in the photograph and thus continue with his work.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer, compost, pest control, herbicide, etc., and to improve the land.

loans.name: Alhaji Sani

texts.en:
Alhaji Sani is a Babban Gona farmer from Ali Gari Village. He joined Babban Gona so that he could realise better yields on his farm. Since joining Babban Gona, he no longer has to worry about having inadequate income to feed his family and children.

Through Babban Gona’s input loan, Alhaji Sani will have access to top-of-the-range farm inputs, such as fertilisers, herbicides and improved seeds that will help him earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize/ hectare, double the national average in Nigeria. This season Alhaji Sani has ambitious plans to harvest 73 bags of maize. This will see him increase his income considerably.

Thanks to Babban Gona’s support, Alhaji Sani now has the opportunity to ensure that all his children get a post-secondary education.

loans.use: to purchase improved farm inputs that will increase yields.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase farm inputs such as fertilizers for top dressing his crops so as to get a better harvest for family use and sell the surplus in the market.

loans.name: Elmira

texts.en:
This woman is 54 years old and she lives in Kapan city of Syunik region. Elmira has higher pedagogical education and for a long time she worked at the school as a teacher of physics. 

Now she is a director of the same school where she worked over 20 years. She also gives paid private courses of physics for the pupils who are getting prepared for the entrance exams. As she says she likes her work and feels great responsibility since her subject is very difficult one she does her best to make it interesting and attractive for her pupils. Elmira is married and she has a son and a daughter. Elmira, as well as all her family members are employed, but all of them find some time to take care of their nice farm. 

Now this loan Elmira asks as she wants to repair the room where she is having her private courses and she also needs to buy professional literature.

loans.use: to repair the room where she is gives her private courses and she also needs to buy professional literature

loans.name: Greisy Del Amparo

texts.es: Greisy es una empírica comerciante, dedicada hace tres años a la venta de productos por intermedio de catálogos especializados, esta idea de negocio fue promovida por una vecina que le contó sobre las ventajas de incorporarse como consultora de productos de belleza y cuidado personal, Greisy acepto muy entusiasta, puesto que siempre le han gustado las ventas.  En la actualidad ofrece a sus vecinos y amigos maquillajes, perfumes, cremas corporales, tratamientos antienvejecimiento, shampoo y masajes, entre otros productos de la oferta del catálogo.  Ella ofrece comodidad de pago a sus clientes, sin embargo su capital es muy escaso para brindar los productos a un mayor plazo y muchas veces pierde la oportunidad de vender mucha más cantidad. Con la finalidad de superar esta limitación, está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para compra perfumes, cremas y maquillajes, encargados por sus clientes. Greisy de 29 años es madre de dos hijos menores de edad y está separada de su cónyuge.  Su meta a largo plazo es comprar una vivienda para sus hijos y tener un almacén.
texts.en:
Greisy is a practical businesswoman, who has been working for three years selling products through specialized catalogs. 

This business idea was provided by a neighbor who told her about the advantages of signing up as a beauty and personal care product consultant. Greisy enthusiastically accepted, as she has always enjoyed sales. She currently sells her friends and neighbors make up, perfumes, body creams, anti-aging treatments, shampoo and massages among other products offered through the catalogs. 

She offers convenient payments for her customers, however her capital is very low to offer products in the long term and she often loses the opportunity to sell higher quantities. 

With the aim of overcoming this limitation, she is requesting her first Kiva loan through the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, to buy perfumes, creams and make up, as requested by her customers. 

Greisy, aged 29, is a mother of two young children, and is separated from her partner. Her long term goal is to buy a home for her children and have a grocery store.

loans.use: to buy perfumes, creams and make up

loans.name: Hovik

texts.en:
Hovik is 36 years old and he is very clever prosperous farmer who lives with his wife and two children in Gavar city of Gegharkunik region. Hovik is an economist with higher education and simultaneously with his farm he also works at his specialty. 

Hovik is a famous bee keeper in his city and his farm’s honey is of great demand because of its high quality and taste. Hovik has 62 bee colonies. All of them he cares very properly and already very skillfully. Hovik finds his bee keeping occupation very interesting and profitable and he hopes that may be one of his sons one day will continue his work and he will share all his skills and secrets of bee keeping with him. Hovik’s wife is also employed and only in the process of honey sale she manages to help her husband. 

This loan is very important for Hovik as he wants to buy several beehives also wax papers and frames to develop his beekeeping and also to increase his  income from it.

loans.use: to buy several beehives also wax papers and frames to develop his beekeeping and also to enlarge income from it

loans.name: Susan

texts.en:
Susan temporarily lives in Sevan City in the Gegharkunik region with her two daughters. Her husband is in the Russian Federation working on construction projects. Susan has a cute farm and has cows, a calf, a pig, a piglet, and chickens. She mentions that her farm is little and therefore does not provide a lot of income. Sometimes, her family lacks money. Susan manages to sell a little milk, mecum (national dairy product), meat, and eggs. She sells her products at low prices in order to gain more customers, but despite her efforts, her family’s income is far from being enough. 

Susan is requesting a loan to purchase two more pigs and fodder for her farm cattle. She is hopeful that improving her farm can somehow finally solve her family’s financial problems.

loans.use: to purchase two pigs and fodder for her cattle

loans.name: Anabelle

texts.en:
As a married woman, Anabelle works hard to support her family.

She has a rice vending business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. Anabelle is borrowing PHP 5,000 through NWTF to buy more sacks of rice to sell for her rice vending business.

Anabelle has been sustaining her business activities through her past three loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy more sacks of rice to sell

loans.name: Luís Rey

texts.es:
Luis, de 27 años de edad, estudio hasta bachillerato, está soltero, vive con su madre y tiene la discomóvil desde hace 7 años.

Luis, aprendió todo acerca de las discomóviles gracias a un amigo, ahora cubre eventos sociales y tiene un 
furgón para movilizarse con la disco. 

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar dos pantallas para ambientar mejor la disco y brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes.

Luis, sueña con tener la mejor discomóvil de la zona oriental, con equipo sofisticado y la mejor tecnología en luces y videos.
texts.en:
Luis is 27 years old. He has a high school education. He is single and lives with his mother and has had a mobile disc jockey service for seven years. 

Luis learned everything about mobile disc jockey services thanks to a friend. Now he covers social events and he has a trailer to get the equipment around.   

He needs the loan to buy two screens to give the disc jockey service a better look and offer his customers a better service.

Luis dreams of having the best disc jockey service in the eastern area, with sophisticated service and the best technology with lights and videos.

loans.use: to buy two screen to give the disc jockey service a better look.

loans.name: Habibe

texts.en:
Habibe is 55 years old and a mother of two. She had attended sewing courses when she was young and learned how to sew. After marriage she continued sewing and earned money by sewing clothes for her neighborhood.  

With the help of the loan from Maya, she bought bulk fabric.

Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Habibe Hanım 55 yaşında ve 2 çocuk annesi.  Gençlik yıllarında aldığı dikiş kursları sayesinde dikiş dikmeyi öğrenmiş ve evlendikten sonra bunu değerlendirerek çevresindeki insanlara kıyafetler dikerek para kazanmaya başlamış.  Maya dan aldığı kredi ile toptan kumaş aldı.

loans.use: to buy bulk fabric

loans.name: Benson

texts.en:
Benson, aged 40 years, is married with four children. He does a produce business, mostly in selling ground nuts as his major source of income. 

He has applied for a loan of UGX 5,000,000 (five million shillings only) to buy more produce for his trade. He started business in the year 1984 with high hopes of generating income to cater for his family's needs. His business is located in his local cell of residence, Kinyimi, Mitooma District, and his clients are all categories of people in Mitooma. 

He is a hardworking man who works nine hours a day and is faced with a challenge of price fluctuations, but he is determined to grow his business through his hard work and being honest in his business. He hopes to become financially stable and educate all his children for a better future.

loans.use: to buy ground nuts for his trade

loans.name: Musarat

texts.en:
Musarat is a 49-year-old married woman. Along with her husband, who is shown in this photo, she runs a business buying and selling animals. Musarat buys baby goats and calves at low prices, brings them up, and then sells them in the market at higher prices. She also sells milk to generate extra income. Musarat makes enough through her business to contribute to her family’s income. She is very experienced and has good contacts in the market.

Musarat is requesting a 35,000 PKR loan through the Kashf Foundation to purchase more animals to expand her business and sales. Her loan will improve her income level and allow her to provide for her family’s household expenses.

loans.use: to purchase more animals to improve her sales

loans.name: Dilshad

texts.en:
Dilshad is 44 years old and married woman. The man shown in the photo is Dilshad’s husband who is a driver by profession and provides transportation services using his three-wheeled rickshaw. He has been driving a rickshaw for many years to meet the family expenses, but now it requires proper maintenance to keep it in its functional routine.

For this reason, Dilshad has availed Murabaha loan of 40000 PKR, for her husband. He wants to buy new tires along with some tools and spare parts for his vehicle. This will help him drive more smoothly and provide better transport service to his passengers. 

Dilshad is hopeful that this loan will be a productive one for her husband and will bring positive changes to his business.

loans.use: to buy new tires along with some tools and spare parts for her husband's vehicle.

loans.name: Shaheen

texts.en:
Shaheen, age 37,  is a married woman and has been running her own beauty parlor in her street along with her daughter (also shown in the photo at the right side). Her daughter is doing her job passionately; she knows the techniques of makeup and hair styling. She is a well-known beautician in her town. 

Shaheen is a responsible mother of five children. She has slowly but surely improved her business through the support of Kashf Foundation. Now she has availed herself of a Murabaha loan of 35,000 PKR for her daughter to buy more beauty products for her beauty parlor, including lotions, makeup kits and lightening creams, to cater to a large number of customers efficiently to earn a good amount of income for bearing her everyday expenditures.

loans.use: to buy more beauty products for her beauty parlor, including lotions, makeup kits and lightening creams, to cater to a large number of customers.

loans.name: Fadi

texts.en:
Fadi is a young man how has a barber shop which has been opened for the past three years. He has now a good experience and he is well known in his city, Gaza. Fadi loves his job and always thinks how to improve it.

Fadi took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help him to buy new tools and make some decoration for his barber shop. This will improve his business and make his barber shop more attractive.
Fadi appears in the photo

loans.use: to buy new tools and make some decoration for his barber shop.

loans.name: Aira Mae

texts.en:
Aira Mae is a woman with four children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Aira Mae is 23 years old and has two children who are in school.

Aira Mae has a fishing business in the Philippines. Aira Mae requested a PHP 3000 loan amount through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Aira Mae has been in this business for 3 years. In the future, Aira Mae would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Gönül

texts.en:
Gönül is 38 years old and a mother of two. In order to support her husband financially she makes decorative soaps. She designs soaps for special occasions. With the help of the loan from Maya, she bought a lot of soap molds. 
 
Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Gönül hanım 38 yaşında 2 çocuk annesi.  Eşine destek olmak amacıyla 5 yıldır dekoratif sabunlar yapıyor.  Bu sabunları özel günler için tasarlıyor.  Maya dan aldığı kredi ile çeşitli sabun kalıpları aldı.

loans.use: to buy a lot of soap molds

loans.name: Almar

texts.en:
Almar is a married man with five children. He is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Almar is 42 years old, and three of his children are currently in school.

Almar has a buying and selling of ornamental plants business in the Philippines. Almar requested a PHP 35,000 loan amount through NWTF to purchase more ornamental plants to sell.

Almar has been in this business for eight years. In the future, Almar would like to save enough money so he could afford to send his children to college.

loans.use: to purchase more ornamental plants to sell

loans.name: Gülay

texts.en:
Gülay is 37 years old. She is a tailor and earns her living by sewing.  At first she only sewed for herself. Later on she sewed for her relatives and neighbors.  

With the help of the loan from Maya she bought bulk sewing materials. 


Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Gülay Hanım 37 yaşında ve geçimini terzilik yaparak sağlıyor.  İlk önce sadece kendi kıyafetlerini dikmiş.  Daha sonra akrabalarına ve çevresine kıyafet dikmeye başlamış ve işini geliştirmiş.  Maya dan aldığı kredi ile  toptan dikiş malzemesi aldı.

loans.use: to buy bulk sewing materials

loans.name: Sara  Beatriz

texts.es:
Sara, de 28 años de edad, es una mujer joven y con muchos sueños, estudió hasta noveno grado, tiene 6 años de estar casada, su esposo es empleado en una empresa que vende agua y tienen dos hijos pequeños.

Sara, siempre fue muy obediente con sus padres, aprendió de su madre las labores necesarias para ser ama de casa, las cuales realiza con mucho esmero, cariño y dedicación.- Hace 7 años conoció a su esposo y se acompañaron, al inicio vivieron en la misma casa de su madre, hasta que unos vecinos amigos de la familia, le ofrecieron vivir en una casita que tenían desocupada y así formar un hogar junto con su esposo y sus hijos.

El préstamo lo necesita para comprar mercadería para una tienda, la cual junto con a su madre han mandado a construir en el patio de la casa de su abuela, decidieron hacerla ahí, porque existe mayor número de casas en dicho lugar y por lo tanto la venta sería mayor. 

El Sueño más grande que tiene Sara, es ver que sus hijos sean personas profesionales, también aspira a ir creciendo en el negocio.
texts.en:
Sara, age 28, is a young woman with a lot of dreams. She studied until the 9th grade, has been married for 6 years, her husband works at a company that sells water and they have 2 small children. 

Sara was always very obedient to her parents. She learned from her mother the necessary skills to become a homemaker, and now she performs them with a lot of care, affection and dedication. 

Seven years ago she met her husband and they got together. At first, they lived at the same house with her mother until some neighbors that were friends of the family offered her and her husband a small unoccupied house that they had so they could start a home along with their children. 

She needs a loan to buy merchandise for a store that she and her mother decided to build in the backyard of grandma’s house. They decided to build it there because there are more houses in that place and the sales would be better. 

Sara’s dream is to see her children become professionals and to make her business grow.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for a store.

loans.name: Haseena

texts.en:
Haseena  is 53 years old working woman. After her marriage, she felt that she should support her husband to improve their financial condition. So she started a business of selling clothes. She believes she can earn some respect and make a better world for her children and their education. Haseena  is well known among her neighbors for her collections and has a good client list. 

Currently she needs a loan of 50000 PKR  to purchase good-quality cloth of different colors to earn substantial profits through this investment. This would lead her to live a decent life and improve her standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase good-quality cloth of different colors to earn substantial profits through this investment

loans.name: Sameena

texts.en:
Sameena is 37 years old and a married woman. She is a mother of four children. She started her business selling animals to help her husband (also shown in the photo) in running their household activities. Sameena earns a good amount of income. 

Now, she has taken a Murabaha loan of 30,000 PKR to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market. She desires to improve her standard of living thorough all her efforts.

loans.use: to purchase more cattle for reselling in the market

loans.name: Zareena

texts.en:
Zareena  is 45 years old, married woman with 4 children, who has been running a business of milk selling for many years with the help of her husband, who is also shown in the photo. She keeps buffaloes for milking purposes and sells the milk in her area. Her business is doing well enough to pay for her family’s expenses. She is a dedicated mother and wants the best for her children. 

She has taken many loans from Kashf Foundation, now, she has requested for a loan of 45000 PKR  to purchase one more buffalo for increasing milk sales to earn good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions to her children.

loans.use: purchase one more buffalo for increasing milk sales to earn a good amount of income to fulfill her dream of providing better living conditions for her children

loans.name: Sajida

texts.en:
Sajida is 34 years old, a married woman and a mother of four children. She is working hard to fulfill their demands, including food, health, clothing, and education.   

She and her husband (also shown in the photo) have been doing work of agriculture for some years. They crop different vegetables and fruits and sell them in the local market.  

She has gradually improved her business with the support of Kashf Foundation. In order to purchase different types of seeds with packs of insecticides and pesticides, currently Sajida has applied for a loan of 50,000 PKR. This would help her to grow more crops, which ultimately helps in generating more cash.

loans.use: to purchase different types of seeds with packs of insecticides and pesticides

loans.name: Sebastiana Del Carmen

texts.es: Sebastiana tiene una edad de 31 años, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y sus dos hijos de 6 y 1 año de edad. Sebastiana es una mujer que desde hace cinco años se dedica a la venta de frutas y verduras y es de esta manera es  como ella genera los ingresos necesarios que ele permiten ayudar a mantener la encomia del hogar. Sebastiana es una mujer visionaria que en busca de mejorar su condición de vida y la de su familia se ha decidido por solicitar un crédito a FUSAI el cual piensa utilizar para la construcción de un cuarto dormitorio de lámina en su vivienda con el fin de ampliar su casa y brindar mayor comodidad a su familia. Por lo anterior ella espera contar con dicho crédito y poder comprar los materiales a utilizar como son: lámina, clavos, madera y además pagara la mano de obra.
texts.en: Sebastiana, 31, lives with her life partner and two children, ages 6 and 1, in a house that she owns. For the past five years, Sebastiana has sold fruits and vegetables, and this is the way she makes the income necessary to allow her to support her househould. Sebastiana is a visionary who, looking to improve her the living conditions of her and her family, has decided to apply to FUSAI for a loan. She intends to use it for the construction of a bedroom made of sheet metal in order to expand her house and provide greater comfort for her family. Therefore, she hopes to receive the loan and to buy materials such as sheet metal, nails, and wood, and also to pay for labor.

loans.use: to buy materials such as sheet metal, nails, and wood, and also to pay for labor to construct a bedroom.

loans.name: Ana Gladis

texts.es: Ana de 43 años de edad es una mujer emprendedora que pone todo su esfuerzo para salir adelante, por lo que desde hace 5 años se dedica a prestar sus servicios de cocinera en un restaurante de playa, por lo que cuenta con muy buenos ingresos económicos. Ana habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su padre un hombre de avanzada edad y su hermana, a los que apoya económicamente.  Ana desea encementar el piso de su vivienda, ya que este es de diferentes materiales entre ellos tierra, por lo que solicita a FUSAI un crédito el cual invertirá en: cemento, arena, grava y mano de obra para encementar el piso de su vivienda y mejorar un poco su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Ana is 43 years old. She is an entrepreneurial woman who puts all her effort into moving forward. For the past 5 years, she has worked as a cook in a restaurant on the beach, so she has very good income.

Ana lives in her own home with her father, who is elderly, and her sister, both of whom she supports financially. Ana would like to install a cement floor in her home, since it is currently made of various material, including dirt. She has requested a loan from FUSAI, which she will use to invest in cement, sand, gravel, and laborers to install the cement floor in her home and improve her living conditions.

loans.use: to invest in cement, sand, gravel, and laborers to install a cement floor in her home and improve her quality of life.

loans.name: Anacita

texts.en:
Anacita is 44 years old and widowed with eight children. With four children in school, Anacita works very hard to provide for them.

Anacita runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell like canned goods, bread, beverages, home care products, and other groceries.

Anacita has been in this business for 28 years. 

In the future, Anacita would like to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, bread, beverages, home care products, and other groceries

loans.name: Annaliza

texts.en:
Annaliza is a married woman with four children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Annaliza is 32 years old, and three of her children are in school.

Annaliza has a food vending business in the Philippines. Annaliza requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Annaliza has been in this business for four years. In the future, Annaliza would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Evelyn

texts.en:
Evelyn is a married woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. Evelyn is 34 years old and has five children who are in school.

Evelyn has a selling of fertilized duck embryo (balut) business in the Philippines. Evelyn requested a PHP 10,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy more eggs to sell to her customers.

Evelyn has been in this business for 10 years. In the future, Evelyn would like to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy more eggs to sell to her customers

loans.name: Verena Patricia

texts.es: Verena de 40 años, es una apasionada por el comercio de mercancías varias y tras haber laborado en empresas por años,  logro obtener un ahorro con el que pudo iniciar un almacén en la comodidad de su vivienda. Ella es madre de dos hijos menores de edad, los cuales requieren de su compañía y cuidado, al considerar estas dos apreciaciones, decidió trabajar desde casa y así no descuidar a su familia y poder ayudar a su cónyuge con los gastos en el hogar. En la actualidad ella ofrece prendas de vestir, artículos para el cuidado personal como perfumes, desodorantes, shampoo, cremas corporales y demás.  Verena desea que su negocio este más surtido y para ello está aplicando a su primer credikiva por intermedio de la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, para comprar perfumes, cremas, maquillajes y demás artículos.  Su meta a futuro es mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y mejorar la imagen de su negocio para tener más participación en el mercado.
texts.en:
Verena is 40 years old. She is passionate about selling various types of merchandise. By working in businesses for several years, she has been able to build her savings, which she used to start her own store in the comfort of her own home. She is the mother of two young children who require her company and care. After considering her two children, she decided to work from home and not neglect her family, while still helping her partner with the household expenses. 

Currently, she offers clothing, personal care items like perfume, deodorant, shampoo, and body lotion, and other things. Verena hopes to stock her store more, so she is applying for her first Kiva loan through the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation. She will purchase perfumes, creams, makeup, and other items.

Her future goal is to improve her family's quality of life and improve her business's image so that she can participate more in the market.

loans.use: to purchase perfumes, creams, makeup, and other items.

loans.name: Elif

texts.en:
6 years ago Elif opened a tiny restaurant with three tables and small chairs serving liver.  She had alot of difficulties finding customers but she never gave up.  In time, many people knew about this tiny restaurant and Elif had a good potential of customers.  As the number of customers increased she got the next shop, combined it with her own and expanded her restaurant. 

 Elif is the only woman cooking leaf shaped liver which mostly men like.  Inspite of all the difficulties and obstacles she had lived, she became a successful entrepreneur.   She is using her second loan and with the help of her loans she had renewed her restaurant and her plates.  Elif wants to be a brand on leaf liver in the future.



Translated from Turkish by Maya staff
Elif hanım 6 yıl önce çok küçük bir dükkân, üç masa ve taburelerle ciğer üstüne bir lokanta açtı.  Müşteri çevresi oluşturana kadar zorluklar yaşadı ama vazgeçmedi.  Zaman içinde adını ve lokantasını tanıttı.  Böylece belli bir müşteri potansiyeline sahip oldu.  Müşterileri artınca yan ve arka tarafındaki dükkânları  da alarak kendi yeriyle birleştirdi ve lokantasını büyüttü.  Masa sandalye sayısını artırdı.
       Elif hanım özellikle erkeklerin yaptığı yaprak ciğeri yapan tek kadın.  Yaşadığı bütün engellere ve zorluklara rağmen işini geliştirmeyi başarmış kadın bir girişimci.  Mayadan 2. kredisini kullanan Elif Hanım bu krediler ile lokantasını tadilat yaptırdı ve tabaklarını yeniledi.  Elif hanım gelecekte yaprak ciğerinde bayan usta olarak marka olmak istiyor.

loans.use: to buy renovate her restaurant and to replace her plates

loans.name: Ketura

texts.en:
Ketura is a Babban Gona maize farmer from Dogon Awo Village. Ketura joined Babban Gona to create a better life for her children. In the past, Ketura suffered from poor yields that crippled her ability to pay her children's school fees. 

Through Babban Gona’s input loan, Ketura will have access to the best farm inputs in the market, such as fertilizers, herbicides and improved seeds that will help her earn yields of up to 30 bags of maize/hectare, double the Nigerian national average of 14 bags. This will see her increase her household income considerably. 

Thanks to Babban Gona's support, Ketura now has the opportunity to increase her yields and income and use her additional earnings to acquire more land to put into the Babban Gona program.

loans.use: to purchase improved farm inputs that will increase her farm yields

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy milk, rice, sardines, slippers, soap and cooking oil for resale

loans.name: Nesma

texts.en:
Nesma is a 34-year-old married woman from Nablus city. She lives with her husband and his family in a small house. Her husband works as an employee in a local company where he gets a low income. This income barely covers all the family needs, especially since his mother is very sick and needs medical care.

Nesma uses a room in her house as a beauty salon. She started this business 10 years ago.

Nesma took a USD loan from FATEN. This loan will help her to buy more makeup products and accessories for her beauty salon. This will increase her productivity and also her income. 

Nesma appears in the photo.

loans.use: to buy more makeup products and accessories for her beauty salon.

loans.name: Armand

texts.en: Armand is a 40 year-old married woman. She is living with her husband and two school-aged children. She is a housewife where she is dedicated to her home and family. Her husband owns a small grocery in his town and he is the main income provider but his income is barely sufficient. That’s why, today, Armand is asking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner, Vitas s.a.l.  She will be utilizing the loan to pay her children’s educational fees.  She said that this loan will surely helped her to insure the school year for them, and that makes her very happy.

loans.use: to pay her children’s educational fees

loans.name: Melanio

texts.es:
Melanio tiene 48 años de edad, de estado civil conviviente, vive con su cónyuge y su hija de 8 años, en el caserío Playa azul, que pertenece al distrito de Pucará, provincia de Jaén,región Cajamarca, en la Sierra norte de Perú. La vida en la comunidad es tranquila, los pobladores se dedican principalmente al comercio y crianza de ganado menor.

Melanio se dedica a brindar servicio de transporte de pasajeros en su vehículo (mototaxi), cuenta con experiencia en el sector y con muy buenas referencias personales y laborales en la zona. El préstamo será utilizado para realizar reparaciones y mantenimiento a su vehículo ya que actualmente se encuentra en mal estado, con esto Melanio espera ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes lo que le generará mayores ingresos y por ende mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Melanio is 48 years old, is in a common law marriage, and lives with his partner and their 8-year-old daughter. They live in the Playa Azul neighborhood in the district of Pucara, Jaen province, Cajamarca region, which is in the northern mountains of Peru. Life in the community is calm, and the residents mainly work in commerce or raise cattle.

Melanio makes a living by providing transportation services to people with his mototaxi. He has experience in this area and has good personal and work references. 

He will use the loan to make repairs and maintenance for his vehicle, which is currently in a bad state. Melanio hopes to offer better service to his customers, which will provide more income and improve his and his family's quality of life.

loans.use: to make repairs and maintenance on his vehicle, since it is currently in a bad state.

loans.name: Clara

texts.en:
Clara is 53 years old.  She is married and has two children. With both children in school, Clara works very hard to provide for them.

Clara runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 5000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, like bread, snack foods, home product care, and other groceries. Clara has been in this business for two years. 

In the future, Clara would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like bread, snack foods, home product care, and other groceries

loans.name: Jonnalyn

texts.en:
Jonnalyn is single and has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to purchase ingredients for her food production business.

Jonnalyn has been in this business for two years now. In the future, she would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Noeline

texts.en:
Noeline is from Kigali.  She was accepted by Kepler from over 6,000 applicants, showing her motivation and ability through her high school results, standardized testing and a personal interview. 

Noeline has three brothers and a sister. She will be the first in her family to get a college degree. She says she is both courageous and ambitious.  Even when faced with complications or difficulties, she says she does not give up.

Noeline plans to major in Business and Communications and will graduate Kepler with an AA and a BA from an accredited US university.  She plans to develop skills in areas such as critical thinking and collaboration while at Kepler.  She says after graduation, she wants to get a job such as being a 
marketing manager so that the following generation will be supported as she is supported.

loans.use: To pay for a laptop required for a US college degree.

loans.name: Guillermo

texts.es: Don Guillermo de 54 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa, el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace 35 años, comercializa sus productos en los diferentes mercados que se encuentran cerca de su casa, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, el esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de semillas, abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes, etc. y mejorar el terreno que muestra la fotografía y así continuar con sus cultivos para tener mejores ingresos económicos.
texts.en:
Guillermo is 54 and lives in his own house with his wife. He has been making a living from agriculture for 35 years. He sells his products in the various markets that are close to his house. With the income that he generates he is able to cover some of the household costs. 

He is asking for a loan to buy seeds, compost, pesticides, fertilizers etc. and to improve the land shown in the photograph. This will allow him to continue growing his crops and make a better income.

loans.use: to buy seeds, compost, pesticides, fertilizers etc. and to improve his land

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es: Ana Isabel, mayor de edad casada con cinco hijos todos mayores e independientes, origen chinandegana ubicado en el occidente del pais,es una micro empresaria que se dedida a la elaboracion y ventas de dulces de coco(cajetas), agua de coco helada negocio el cual esta ubicado en su misma casa de habitacion los procesos de elaboracion de sus productos los realiza en su casa y posteriormente sale a las cale a vender sus deliciosas cajetas de coco y agua heldas, tambien ofrece estos mismos productos en otros municipios el cual entrega a dueños de pulperias, comiderias, escuelas, colegios entre otros, sus ventas son al contado y al credito, los cuales recupera semanal tiene clientes fijos y eventuales, sus compras de materia prima las realiza en distribuidoras de sus misma localidad y los cocos a dueños de fincas y productores locales, Ana es una mujer trabajadora, responsable que con este negocio logro sacar a delante a sus hijos hasta verlos preparados, negocio el cual lo unicia con fondos propios, su jornada diaria inicia desde muy temprano para lograr salir por las tardes a recorrer las calles de la ciudad para las entrega de sus productos, el objetivo de este nuevo financiamiento es para invertir en capital de trabajo en la compra de productos como: azucar,  roda mina, cocos, papel de envolver, canela leña, bolsas plasticas, entre otros, Ana agradece mucho el apoyo que los inversionistas kivas les ofrece a personas de bajos recursos economicos y tener un medio digno de trabajo
texts.en:
Ana Isabel, an elderly woman, is married and has five children. All of them are grown and independent. She is from Chinandega, which is in the western part of the country. She is a businesswoman who makes and sells coconut candy (caramels) and chilled coconut water. Her business is located at her house. She makes the products at her house, and she later goes out to sell her delicious coconut caramels and chilled water on the street. She also sells these products in other municipalities. She delivers her products to the owners of grocery stores, eateries, and schools, among others. She makes her sales for cash and on credit. She collects weekly. She has regular and casual customers. She buys her raw materials from distributors in her area. She gets the coconuts from farmers and local producers.

Ana is a hard-working and responsible woman. With this business she managed to get her children ahead and see them become prepared. She started her business with her own funds.
