Thanks to the fact that he lives in a very fertile area Bartolo has been able to obtain very good harvests which has been very helpful for him. 

Bartolo now needs to plant his crop but he does not have the sufficient capital to be able to do so. This is what motivated him to ask for a loan, which he will use to buy onion seed and chemical fertilizer so that he is able to plant this season.

Bartolo's greatest wish is for his crop and income to increase so that he can offer his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy onion seed and chemical fertilizer

loans.name: Berta

texts.en: Berta has been involved in activities since 2012. She started her business with her own working capital of $ 1000.00. She also cultivates animals, like pigs, chickens and dogs. Berta is married, and there are 4 members in the family, including her husband. Her husband works in agriculture. Berta has a shop for  her business and she also sells in the market. So she is requesting a loan of $800.00 from Tuba Rai Metin because she wants to buy additional supplies according to what people like, such as sugar, spices, noodles, slippers, cooking oils, soft drinks and other things to sell.

loans.use: To buy sugar, spices, noodles, slippers, cooking oils, soft drinks and other things to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, buttons and others.

loans.name: Martina Elena

texts.es: Martina de 42 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella posee desde hace 15 años una pequeña tienda ubicada en su lugar de residencia, tiene muchos clientes por los buenos precios y la amabilidad que tiene a la hora de vender, con las ganancias que obtiene logra salir adelante,ella está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar más sopas, huevos, granos básicos, refrescos, golosinas, pan dulce, etc. y así poder tener mejores ingresos para una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en: Martina is 42 years old and lives in a home of her own with her husband.  She has had a small shop in her home for 15 years and has many customers because of her good prices and friendly service and she gets ahead with her income. She is asking for a loan to buy more soups, eggs, basic grain, soft drinks, sweets, sweat bread, etc. so she can have a better income and improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to stock her store

loans.name: Analie

texts.en:
As a married mother of three children, Analie works hard to support her family.

She has a bread retailing business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from food vending. Analie is borrowing PHP 15,000 through NWTF in order to buy more bread to sell to customers.

Analie has been sustaining her business activities through her past 4 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she can continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more bread to sell.

loans.name: Orlando

texts.es: Don Orlando se dedica a la reparación de vehículos en su taller mecánico, él necesita un préstamo de ₡ 1 050 000 para la compra de equipo y llantas necesarios para la reparación de los mismos, esto le permitirá incrementar su clientela y mejorar la rentabilidad de su negocio.
texts.en: Orlando repairs vehicles in his mechanics workshop and needs a ₡ 1 050 000 loan to buy equipment and tires needed to make repairs.  This will allow him to increase his customers and improve the business’ profitability.

loans.use: to buy tires and tools.

loans.name: Epifania

texts.en:
Epifania’s sacrifices such as back pains, blurring eyes, exhaustion and hunger due to thirty five years of tailoring all paid off when her two children finished their college degree. She’s a widow who was able to fulfill her responsibilities to her children with the aid of her tailoring business. She already has seven workers in her shop located in Santa Barbara, Iloilo.

Epifania still feels responsible for the continued livelihood of her workers, that’s why she keeps on and aspires to further improve her business. She wants to avail herself of a PHP 33,000 loan to buy more cloth, thread, buttons, and other accessories in order to produce more clothes. This will benefit her and her workers. She plans to buy a vehicle for efficient delivery of her products.

She prays for good health, long life and spiritual growth with her children. She meets up with her co-fellowship members to share stories of her work every week. This is where she draws strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God. * All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the word of God, build social capital, and pay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy more cloth, thread, buttons, and other accessories for her tailoring business.

loans.name: Gresilda

texts.en:
As a married mother of two children, Gresilda works hard to support her family.

She has an Avon dealership business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from poultry. Gresilda is borrowing PHP 12,000 through NWTF in order to buy more Avon products to sell to customers.

Gresilda has been sustaining her business activities through her past 7 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save money to expand her business and support the financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to buy more Avon products to sell to customers.

loans.name: Gemma

texts.en:
Gemma is 30 years old and has four children. She is married and three of her children are in school.

Gemma is in the agricultural business in the Philippines. Gemma requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs. She has been raising pigs for four years now, and has borrowed 11 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Gemma would like to save enough money so she continue to send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Godelia

texts.en:
Godelia is 53 years old and married with three children.

Godelia works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 15,000 loan through NWTF in order to purchase more groceries to sell.

Godelia has borrowed and repaid 4 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for five years and also earns an income from ice cream vending.

Godelia aspires to save enough money in order to support the financial stability for her family.

loans.use: to purchase more groceries to sell.

loans.name: Gina

texts.en:
Gina is 43 years old, and she is married with 2 children. Both of her children attend school.

Gina works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and has requested a 11,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to purchase additional groceries to sell.

Gina has borrowed and repaid 2 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running her general store for 2 years, and she also earns an income from fattening pigs.

Gina aspires to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase additional groceries to sell.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.en:
Gloria is 55 years old, and she is married with 6 children. She earns a living by raising pigs in the Philippines. 

Gloria is borrowing 10,000 PHP through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation in order to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Gloria has been raising pigs for 5 years, and she also earns additional income from farming rice. She is working tirelessly toward the attainment of her dream: to save enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Hillary

texts.en:
Hello, lenders. Meet Hillary, a 28-year-old farmer from the remote village of Kuserwo, situated in the Rift valley province of Kenya. The living conditions in this area are tough because there is no clean water nor electrical connections. 

Hillary lives with his lovely family on a small piece of land where he keeps dairy cows and poultry and grows a wide variety of crops. For 10 years, his primary sources of income have been milk, eggs and horticultural produce. Hillary's biggest challenges are disease and a shortage of farm inputs. Farmers in the area lack capital to purchase farm inputs such as chemicals to prevent these diseases. 

Hillary made the decision to join Juhudi Kilimo in order to access loans that would help him improve his farming activities. Sometime last month, he applied for a loan for expanding his horticulture farm. This will enable him to expand his operations and increase his overall output. The additional income from the expansion will go to Hillary's children's education. The cost of education in Kenya is becoming prohibitive for low-income communities, especially in the rural areas. As a result, kids are forced to drop out and start working to contribute their earnings to their families. 

With your loan, Hillary’s children will acquire a quality education that will act as a strong foundation for a bright future.

loans.use: To  buy seeds and expand his horticulture farm

loans.name: San Cayetano Group

texts.es:
El comité SAN CAYETANO, es un grupo nuevo que se formó en la localidad de Santaní, integrado por 15 señoras responsables, humildes y trabajadoras, que se fijaron como meta el crecimiento de cada una de ellas, no solo como persona, sino también en lo económico.
La Sra. Marta forma parte de este comité, es una señora muy trabajadora, tiene una despensa en su propia casa donde ofrece todos los productos básicos de la canasta familiar, abastece a todas las familias de la comunidad, y por medio de su negocio de ventas tiene los medios para poder ayudar a su familia y seres queridos.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder comprar bebidas, comestibles, verduras, frutas, enlatados, yerba, azúcar y otros, y con ello poder tener una buena variedad que poder ofrecer a sus clientes, y con lo cual podrá seguir con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo.
texts.en:
The "San Cayetano" committee is a new group which was formed in the village of Santaní. It is made up of 15 responsible, humble and hard-working women whose goal is for each one of them to grow both personally and economically. 

Marta is part of this committee. She is a very hard-working woman who has a grocery business in her own house where she sells all the basic household products. She supplies all the families in the community and through her business she has the means to support her family and her loved ones. 

She is asking for this loan so that she can buy drinks, groceries, vegetables, fruit, canned goods, yerba mate tea, sugar and other products. This will allow her to have a good variety of products to offer her customers  and to be able to continue with her sales as she has been doing.

loans.use: to buy drinks, groceries, vegetables, fruit, canned goods, yerba mate tea, sugar and other products

loans.name: Maryan

texts.es: Maryan se desempeña como estilista en su propio salón de belleza. Ella solicita un préstamo de ₡ 350 000 para comprar productos de belleza de mejorar calidad, esto con el fin de ofrecer un mejor servicio a sus clientes y hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en: Maryan works as a stylist in her own beauty salon.  She is asking for a loan of ₡ 350 000 to buy better quality beauty products so she can offer better service to her customers and grow her business.

loans.use: to buy supplies.

loans.name: Carmelita

texts.en:
Carmelita has a collection of ornamental garden plants. She finds pleasure in doing her gardening activities and is also able to earn an income for her family. 

As a Microfinance member of Paglaum Mulit-Purpose Cooperative, Carmelita is seeking financial help to purchase a variety of ornamental plants that she can grow and sell.

In the future, Carmelita wishes to become the supplier of flowers to the neighboring towns.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of ornamental plants that she can grow and sell.

loans.name: Pisey

texts.en:
Pisey is an 18-year-old single student who is pursuing a bachelor’s degree, majoring in accounting. She is in her first year at a university in the city. She is from the Pursat province in Cambodia. Her father works as a deputy principal at a secondary school and her mother earns some income from fattening pigs at home.

Now Pisey is lacking the money to pay her university fees from the second semester of her first year through her fourth year, therefore she needs a loan. This loan will help her graduate successfully and gain important skills to build her future.

After graduation, she dreams of having a good job with a decent salary, so she will be able to save money to build a proper house.

loans.use: to pay her university fees from the second semester of her first year through her fourth year

loans.name: Rosaura De Jesus

texts.es:
Una señora trabajadora, humilde y llena de vida. Así es Rosaura, a sus 62 años monto su propio negocio, una tienda de abarrotes, un medio por el cual ha logrado salir adelante ante la ausencia de su esposo quien la dejo hace poco.

Debido a que no cuenta con un buen surtido en su negocio, pide un auxilio económico el cual lo invertirá en la compra de productos de aseo personal y productos de la canasta familiar como lo es el arroz, aceite, sal, azúcar, bebidas y carnes frías.

Piensa en ampliar su negocio y lograr generar empleo a la personas que como ella lo necesitan.
Su único sueño es continuar creciendo con su negocio y en un futuro dejarse a sus hijos.
texts.en:
A hard working woman, humble and full of life. This is how to describe Rosaura, at 62 years old she set up her own business, a grocery store. A way in which she has been able to progress forward after being faced with the absence of her partner who left her not long ago.

Due to the fact she doesn't have a good assortment of goods in her business, she is asking for economic aid which she will invest in buying personal cleaning products and essential products such as rice, oil, salt, sugar, drinks and fried meat. 

She thinks of growing her business and being able to employ people who need it. Her only dream is to continue growing her business and in the future leaving it to her children.

loans.use: invest in buying personal cleaning products and essential goods such as rice, oil, salt, sugar, drinks and fried meats.

loans.name: Ernestina

texts.en: Ernestina lives in Atsabe, she was married and she has 3 children. A $1000.00 is offered to Ernestina to improve her business. She has a kiosk where many people come to buy every day. She will buy some additional supplies with this loan such as detergents, cooking oils, hand and body shampoo, cigarettes, sardines, slippers, rubber, biscuits, noodles, water, and other things to sell. She has been involving herself in business activities since 2014. Running a business has made Ernestina independent because she can be responsible for her family. She hopes to run a bigger business in the future.

loans.use: To buy detergents, cooking oils, hand and body shampoo, cigarettes, sardines, slippers, rubber, biscuits, noodles, water, and other things to sell.

loans.name: Florentino

texts.en: Florentino is 84 years old, married, has 5 children of adult age, and lives in Dipolog City. He has been a member of Paglaum MPC since October 2009. He is supported by his children and his pension for his needs. Recently, he requested a loan from the cooperative to pay for medical check-up & purchase of maintenance medicines.

loans.use: to pay for medical check-up & purchase of maintenance medicines

loans.name: Alnie

texts.en:
Alnie, from Santa Barbara, Iloilo, is busy with his enterprises: a “sari-sari” or variety store that sells usual commodities, a tricycle that transport passengers within their community, a direct selling business, and a small farm that he nurtures. His loving wife and business partner, Wilnella, supports him in all his undertakings. They exert their best efforts for the sake of their small child. When he is driving his tricycle, his wife looks after the store. When he’s at the store, his wife will go house to house to sell Avon products. He also takes time to nurture his small farm. They don’t stop thinking about the possible ways on how to enhance their businesses. As much as possible, they want to prepare early for their child’s future.

Now he plans to purchase extra supplies for his variety store in order to gain higher profits. He is applying for a 50,000 loan for this purpose. Part of the loan will be used to buy spare parts for his tricycle, Avon products for his wife to sell, and fertilizer for his crops. He hopes, that in due time, all his undertakings will reward the whole family with a comfortable life, good career for his child, and a house and lot. 

Alnie is committed to CCT Credit Cooperative’s vision to alleviate poverty and he regularly meets with his co-fellowship* members every week to share stories of his life and business, and to draw strength and inspiration from the fellowship and the Word of God. *All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and pay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: to purchase extra supplies for his variety store

loans.name: Shyrr

texts.en: Shyrr is 27 years old, married with one child and lives in Dipolog City, Zamboanga del Norte. Her husband works abroad as a seaman which is their primary source of income for their needs. Shyrr knows that it is hard for her husband to work far from his family so she wanted to augment their income by venturing into business. She learned about Paglaum MPC and the financial assistance it extends to borrowers like her. Just this year, she signed up for membership and requested her first loan of PHP 10,000.00 to start up her hog raising business. She will use the amount to purchase heads of piglets & animal feed for a hog raising business. Shyrr is looking forward to success of her business so that her husband will no longer work abroad.

loans.use: to purchase heads of piglets & animal feeds for a hog raising business

loans.name: Jerilyn

texts.en:
Jerilyn is a hardworking woman entrepreneur with 10 children. She earns a living by farming rice in the Philippines. She is taking a 15,000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

Jerilyn supplements her income with earnings from her buy-and-sell rice business.

Jerilyn successfully repaid her previous loans, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business.

Jerilyn dreams that one day she will be able to save enough money to be able to expand her business. She would also like to save enough money to afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilzers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Jhakelin Stella

texts.es:
Jakelin es una joven con 18 años de edad, soltera y madre de una menor, se dedica a la preparación y venta de productos como galletas y tortas, una actividad que aprendió gracias a las enseñanzas de su madre. Su deseo es abrir nuevos locales y generar empleo a las personas que más lo necesiten.
Trabaja todos los días entre 6 y 8 horas diarias.
Su única dificultad es que no cuenta con las suficientes herramientas para realizar esta labor, es por esto que se encuentra solicitando un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en la compra de un horno grande y moldes para tortas y galletas.
Con esto espera realizar su labor de una forma más ágil y eficaz.

Su único propósito para la vida es comprar una vivienda propia y brindarle a su hija una mejor estabilidad económica y buena calidad de vida.
Para esto cuenta con la ayuda de Interactuar y los colaboradores del portal Kiva.
texts.en:
Jhakelin is an 18-year-old woman who is single and has a small child. She makes a living by making and selling goods such as cakes and biscuits, a skill that she learned thanks to her mother's tuition. Her dream is to open new shops and create jobs for the people who need them the most. 

She works every day for between six and eight hours. Her only problem is that she doesn't have the right tools to do this work. This is why she is asking for a loan, which she will invest in buying a big oven and moulds for cakes and biscuits. She hopes that this will mean she can carry out her work in a faster and more efficient way. 

Her only goals in life are to buy her own home and give her daughter greater economic stability and a better quality of life. To achieve this she has the help of Interactuar and those who contribute through Kiva.

loans.use: to buy a big oven and moulds for cakes and biscuits

loans.name: Marichu

texts.en: Marichu has wide experience in farming. She has mastered farming activities from growing, caring, harvesting and earning income as well. Marichu has supported her husband doing this type of work. Like a farmer, Marichu has nurtured her membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. She knows she can always turn to the Cooperative for her financial needs. Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase rice seeds which will have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.  Someday, Marichu hopes to purchase more land to cultivate rice that will potentially add income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds which will have good results in healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings

loans.name: Edith

texts.en:
Edith benefits from insurance and financial assistance from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative. 

Recently, Edith applied for a loan to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks. She is on her way to renovating her house. 

Edith wishes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks.

loans.name: Gaudioso

texts.en:
Gaudioso is starting up for the next cropping season. He wants to prepare well, especially for the much-needed land and seedbed preparations. 

Gaudioso wants to have enough supply of corn fertilizer, so he has applied for a loan from Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative. 

Gaudioso hopes to save enough to pay for the education of his children.

loans.use: to buy corn fertilizer to increase production.

loans.name: Alona

texts.en:
Alona is 24 years old and married with three children.

She works hard to provide for her family. She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 10000 loan through NWTF to buy items to sell, like canned goods, milk, coffee, etc.

Alona has borrowed and paid 2 loans from NWTF before this loan. She has been running the general store for 5 years and also earns an income from buying and selling peanuts.

She aspires to build and expand her business to secure the future of her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell like canned goods, milk, coffee, etc.

loans.name: Panha

texts.en: Panha, 21 years old and single, is a student who is pursuing a bachelor’s degree, majoring in electrical engineering in his third year at a university in the city. He is from the Pursat province in Cambodia. His father works as a deputy principal at a secondary school and his mother earns some income from fattening pigs at home. Now Panha is lacking the money to cover his university fees from the third to his fourth year so he has decided to take out a loan. With this loan, he will have enough money for earning a bachelor’s degree and graduate successfully. After graduation, he is going to find a good job with a decent salary,so he will be able to save money to build his own house.

loans.use: to cover his university fees from the third to his fourth year

loans.name: Edrito

texts.en:
Edrito is 58 years old. He is known in the Tulapos, Enrique Villanueva, Larena, Siquijor area for his ready-to-wear business. He actively participates in the various programs and services that the co-op offers.

Edrito hopes to live comfortably, with a decent house, so he applied for a loan to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks. He hopes to maintain his membership in good standing, with a good repayment record. It matters that he has been given a priority, as a microfinance member of Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative (PMPC). This is what he is thankful for, when all his financing needs of his business are supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase plywood, nails, and sticks for his house.

loans.name: Marivel

texts.en: Marivel is a businesswoman who earns through retailing various items. She is also a corn grower that augments her income. She is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurances and financial assistance. Recently, she applied for a loan to buy building materials, paints, and pay her workers. She is on her way to renovating her house. She wishes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to buy building materials, paints, and pay her workers

loans.name: Vilma

texts.en: Vilma is 41 years old and married. She lives in Lilo-an, Maria-Larena, Siquijor. For the past 10 years, Vilma has been a farmer. She earns 5,000 PHP each month and is a new member of PMPC. Vilma is requesting a 7,000 PHP loan to purchase bags of fertilizer. In the future, she hopes to expand and improve her business.

loans.use: to purchase bags of fertilizer

loans.name: Nelfha

texts.en:
Nelfha has a wide experience in farming. She has mastered farming activities from growing, caring for and harvesting and earns an income as well. Nelfha has supported her husband doing this type of work.

Like a farmer, Nelfha has nurtured her membership with PMPC and has maintained a good repayment record. She knew she can always turn to the Cooperative for her financial needs. Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase rice seeds that will have good results with healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

Someday, Nelfha hopes to purchase more rice land to cultivate that will potentially add income for the family.

loans.use: to purchase rice seeds that will have good results with healthier, heavier, and potentially higher-yielding seedlings.

loans.name: Winifreda

texts.en: Winifreda wants to live comfortably in a house that has good roofing. The renovation will be financed by her loan of PHP 14,900. She hopes to maintain her membership in good standing, with a good repayment record -- a matter that she has given priority, as a microfinance member of PMPC. She is thankful for PMPC, as all of her financing needs on her retailing business have been supported by PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase materials for house renovation

loans.name: Clodualdo

texts.en: Clodualdo is 77 years old, married and lives in San Vicente Bajo, Oroquieta City, Misamis Occidental. He has been a pensioner-member of Paglaum MPC for almost nine years. He actively participates in activities of the cooperative that aim to educate members like him. Recently, he took out a loan of PHP 25,000 to pay for a medical check-up and maintenance medicines. He looks forward to more success by the cooperative so that it can serve more clients beyond Northern Mindanao.

loans.use: to pay for a medical check-up and maintenance medicines

location.town: Oroquieta-San Vicente Bajo, Oroquieta City Misamis

loans.name: Rosalinda

texts.en: Rosalinda is a businesswoman who earns income through retailing various items. She is a full-fledged member of PMPC and enjoys the benefits of insurance and financial assistance. Recently, she applied for a loan to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks. She is on her way to renovating her house. She wishes to live comfortably with her family.

loans.use: to purchase bags of cement and hollow blocks

loans.name: Yuliana

texts.es:
Yuliana es una mujer con 23 años de edad, casada y con una hija de 5 años, trabajadora y muy humilde, con su  mucho esfuerzo y dedicación logro montar su propio negocio, un taller de confecciones, con esto ha tenido un gran progreso, pues en su barrio es muy reconocida por calidad, economía y buen servicio.
Cuenta con un empleado el cual se encarga de realizar las terminaciones de cada prenda.
Actualmente se encuentra solicitando un préstamo con el cual comprara una maquina fileteadora industrial.

El sueño de esta mujer es continuar trabajando, ahorrar parte de sus ingresos y comprarse una vivienda propia.
Sabe que de la mano de Interactuar y los colaboradores del portal Kiva lo lograra.
texts.en:
Yuliana is a 23 year old woman who is married and has one daughter who is 5 years old. She is hardworking and humble, and with her hard work and dedication she managed to start her own business, a clothing shop. With this she has had great progress, and in her neighborhood it is well known for quality, economy, and good service.

She has an employee who is responsible for conducting the terminations of each garment. She is currently requesting a loan with which she will buy an industrial filleting machine.

Her dream is to continue working and save part of her income to buy her own home. She knows that the hand of Interactuar and the partners of Kiva will help her achieve it.

loans.use: to buy an industrial filleting machine.

loans.name: Delyna

texts.en: Delyna signed up for her membership with PMPC and obtained the needed capital to start a sari-sari (convenience) store business. She is thankful for the capital that was extended to a small-time borrower like her. Delyna is able to turn the tide in her favor and is making good sales these days. She wants to take advantage of her good fortune. Recently, she took out a loan to restock her store with basic commodities like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce. In the future, she hopes to build a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock her store with items like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce.

loans.name: Luis Alfredo

texts.es:
Luis es caracterizado por ser un joven que siempre está ayudando a os demás. Desde pequeño, este estudiante de medicina se vio estudiante y trabajando como médico, pues además de parecerle interesante estudiar el cuerpo humano, siente mucha vocación para eso. A sus 23 años de edad ya está en cuarto año de la carrera y se siente muy orgulloso, pues se ha convertido en uno de los mejores estudiantes que hasta ha conseguido una beca. 
A casi la mitad de su carrera como futuro doctor, siente que quiere dar lo mejor de él, por esta razón, solicita un préstamo para comprar herramientas médicas y una computadora, de manera que se le facilitaran los medios para seguir con la práctica en su carrera de medicina.  En los planes de Luis esta realizar una especialidad y establecer su propio negocio en cuanto termine su carrera universitaria
texts.en:
Luis is described as a young man who is always helping others. Since he was little, this medical student saw himself as a student and working as a doctor. In addition to the study of the human body seeming interesting to him, he feels a strong calling to it. At 23 years old, he is already in his fourth year of the university career and he feels very proud because he has become one of the top students and has even won a scholarship. 

At almost halfway into his career as a future doctor, he feels that he wants to give the best of himself. For this reason, he is requesting a loan to buy medical tools and a computer to facilitate the means to continue practicing his medical career. Luis' plans include achieving a degree and establishing his own business when he finishes his university career.

loans.use: to buy medical tools and a computer.

loans.name: Arlene

texts.en: Arlene is 42 years old and lives in Macabayao, Jimenez, Misamis Occidental. She is married with three children, including an infant. Arlene has earned a living from unhusked rice (palay) trading  and rice production financing (pacoma) for seven years, earning approximately PHP 10,000 each month. She has requested a loan to buy 25 sacks of palay for drying, milling and wholesaling. Arlene has been a member of PMPC for four years. In the future, Arlene hopes to expand her palay trading business and to become a major trader in the area.

loans.use: To buy 25 sacks of palay (unhusked rice).

loans.name: Juan Carlos

texts.es: Juan de 47 años de edad vive con su esposa  y sus hijos de 21 y 18 años de edad. El posee una panadería donde vende pan en variedad, es muy conocida en la zona y ya tiene mucha clientela pues su producto es el más rico, de primera calidad y a precio accesible, además el servicio es  excelente ya que Juan siempre recibe a sus clientes muy amable y con una sonrisa en su rostro, es un hombre emprendedor y muy seguro de lo que quiere, le gusta trabajar y estar siempre a la vanguardia con su negocio, piensa que lo fundamental para el éxito es la perseverancia y el la posee es por eso que se decidió a solicitar a FUSAI un crédito que le permita comprar harina por mayor cantidad, azúcar, levadura, leche, entre  otros, para así aumentar su producción  y obtener mayores ingresos por sus ventas  y  así podrá darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Juan, 47 years old, lives with his wife and his 21-year old and 18-year old children. He has a bakery where he sells a variety of bread. He is very well known in the area and already has a lot of customers, because his product is the tastiest, of high quality, and reasonably priced. Moreover, the service is excellent, since Juan is always friendly with his customers and greets them with a smile on his face.

He is an entrepreneurial man who knows what he wants. He likes to work and always be at the cutting edge of his business. He thinks that the foundation of success is perseverance, and he has it. That is why he decided to apply to FUSAI for a loan which will allow him to buy flour at wholesale quantities, sugar, yeast, milk, and other things, in order to increase his production and get better earnings from his sales. This will allow him to give his family a better quality of life.

loans.use: to buy:  flour in wholesale quantities, sugar, yeast, milk, and other things, in order to increase his bread production.

loans.name: Rosa Poty Group

texts.es:
El comité se denomina Rosa Poty se encuentra en el segundo ciclo, es un grupo muy unido con 17 integrantes, cada una con metas propias para lograr mejorar la situación de vida de sus familias. Se unieron para poder ayudar a sus seres queridos por medio de su trabajo en equipo y sumada a las capacitaciones por parte de la fundación paraguaya.
Se destaca la Sra. Liliana que además de la cría de animales, cuenta con una casilla donde ofrece minutas preparadas higiénicamente, jugos naturales, gaseosas, chicles entre otros. Es una mujer muy trabajadora, que se gana la vida de una manera digna y honesta, y con su trabajo ayuda a su familia y a sus seres queridos.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de golosinas, verduras, hortalizas, bebidas y otros, para poder surtir su casilla y de esa forma poder continuar con sus ventas como lo viene haciendo para poder ayudar a su familia.
texts.en:
The committee named "Rosa Poty" is in its second semester. It is a very unified group with 17 members, each one with goals to improve their family's living conditions. They came together to be able to help their loved ones through teamwork and joining the trainings given by the Fundación Paraguaya.

Liliana stands out. In addition to raising animals, she has a stall where she sells quick, hygienically-prepared meals, natural juices, soft drinks, gum, and other things. She is a very hardworking woman who makes her living in a decent and honest way. Through her work, she helps her family and loved ones.

She is asking for this loan to buy snacks, vegetables, greens, drinks, and other things, in order to stock her stall, and in this way continue with her sales as she has been doing in order to help her family.

loans.use: to buy snacks, vegetables, greens, drinks, and other products.

loans.name: Cintya

texts.en: Cintya is 31 years old. She is a single mother and she is still living with her parents This season Cintya is selling cookies; she needs a loan to buy a larger quantity of cookies for her business. Cinthya is also selling biscuits but the panetón (a kind of cake only for Christmas), so she hopes you can help her again. Cintya is healthy and she works hard.

loans.use: to buy a larger quantity of cookies.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha works hard to support her family. Editha is married and has a restaurant business in the Philippines.

She requested a PHP 30,000 loan through NWTF to purchase additional ingredients like spices, canned goods, meat, and vegetables.

Editha has been in this business for 15 years now.

In the future, Editha would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional ingredients like spices, canned goods, meat, and vegetables.

loans.name: Joanne

texts.en:
Joanne is 24 years old and married with one child. She works very hard to provide for them.

She runs a general store in the Philippines and requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to by more of household goods to sell, like soap, canned goods, eggs, noodles, etc.

Joanne has been in this business for 5 years.

In the future Joanne would like to build and expand her business to secure the financial stability of her family.

loans.use: to buy more household goods to sell, like soap, canned goods, eggs, noodles, etc.

loans.name: Habiba

texts.ru: Хабиба  доброжелательная и молодая женщина, ей 45 лет. Она замужем и у неё трое детей. Хабиба живет вместе со своей семьёй  в городе Душанбе, она  занята в малом бизнесе.  Она покупает материал и вышивает из него национальные платья, которые продает на рынке. Всё что она зарабатывает, расходуется на содержание семьи. У неё нет возможности накопить денег для другие более перспективные цели. Хабиба хочет увеличить свой оборот, так как  спрос на её продукцию повышается. Но у неё не хватает денежных средств на другие потребности, для  этого она  обратился в ООО МДО Арванд за получением кредита с целью  увеличения своего оборотного капитала. Она очень благодарна ООО МДО "Арванд" за поддержку и доверие оказанную ей.
texts.en: Habiba is a friendly young woman. She is 45 years old. She is married and she has three children. Habiba lives with her family in the city of Dushanbe. She operates a small business. She buys fabric and embroiders it into national dresses which she sells at market. Everything that she earns is spent on supporting her family. She is not able to save money for other more long-term goals. Habiba wants to increase her turnover, since demand for her products is increasing. But she does not have enough funds for other needs. As a result she has applied to MDO Arvand to get a loan with the aim of increasing her working capital. She is very grateful to MDO Arvand for the support and trust it has provided her.

loans.use: to buy fabric to sew national dresses for sale.

loans.name: Annet

texts.en:
Annet is a hardworking woman from Nyakayojo, in the Mbarara district of Kenya.  

Annet has applied for a 2,000,000 UGX loan to buy mulch and cow dung to spread in her banana plantation. 

Annet's husband died and left her with a family of 6 children who are attending school, but she has no money to educate them. She therefore has accessed a loan to improve her plantation and earn enough income to pay her children's school fees. 

Annet is hardworking and wishes to see her children prosper.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs.

loans.name: Gulniso

texts.ru: Гулнисо  доброжелательная и трудолюбивая женщина, ей 50 лет. Она замужем. Гулнисо живет вместе со своей семьёй  в городе Душанбе, она  работает в  общеобразовательной средней  школе, в  должности преподавателя. Всё что она зарабатывает, расходуется на содержание семьи. У неё нет возможности накопить денег для других более перспективные цели. Гулнисо хочет сделать ремонт у себя дома. Но у неё не хватает денежных средств на другие потребности, для  этого она  обратился в ООО МДО Арванд за получением кредита с целью  капитального ремонта своего дома. Она очень благодарна ООО МДО "Арванд" за поддержку и доверие оказанную ей.
texts.en: Gulniso is a friendly and hard-working woman. She is 50 years old and married. Gulniso and her family live in the city of Dushanbe. She works in a comprehensive secondary school as a teacher. Everything that she earns is spent on supporting her family. She is not able to save up for other longer-term goals. Gulsino wants to renovate her house but she does not have sufficient funds for such needs, so she has applied to MDO Arvand to get a loan with the aim of carrying out a complete renovation of her house. She is very grateful to MDO Arvand for the trust and support provided to her.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to renovate her house.

loans.name: Letecia

texts.en:
Letecia is 54 years old, married and has four children, two of whom are in school. 

She is in the agricultural business, fattening pigs in the Philippines. Letecia requested a PHP 12,000 loan through NWTF to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

Letecia has been fattening pigs for 8 years now, and has borrowed 19 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Letecia would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vitamins for her pigs.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en: Sarah is married and for the past eight years has been buying, then selling dried fish in the Philippines. She has applied for a 23,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell. She is continually working with the purpose of building up her business.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of dried fish to sell

loans.name: Aquino Poty Group

texts.es:
El comité Aquino Poty se encuentra en el sexto ciclo. El grupo se formó en la ciudad de Santaní, una zona alejada de la capital del país, donde en su mayoría todas las integrantes se dedican a actividades rurales luchando por poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida. El grupo se formó con el fin de ayudarse mutuamente a mejorar la calidad de vida entre vecinas.
La señora Sonia  se dedica a la cría de animales como gallinas y chanchos y con el préstamo que pide quiere construir un gallinero para poder seguir con la cría de sus gallinas como lo viene haciendo.
Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora que quiere salir adelante por medio de su sacrificio y esfuerzo, es por ello que pone todo de sí para poder crecer y salir adelante.
texts.en:
The Aquino Poty communal bank is in its sixth loan cycle. The group was formed in the city of Santaní, an area far from the capital of the country. The majority of the members work in rural occupations, striving to improve their living conditions. The group was created with the goal among these neighbor women of mutually helping each other improve their quality of life.

Sonia works at breeding and raising animals like chickens and pigs. With the loan that she is requesting, she wants to build a chicken coop in order to be able to continue raising her hens as she is presently doing. She is a very hardworking woman who wants to get ahead through her sacrifice and efforts. For this reason, she gives her all to be able to grow and succeed.

loans.use: to build a chicken coop.

loans.name: Luz Aida

texts.es:
Aida es una señora con 44 años de edad, casada y madre de cinco hijos mayores.
Trabajadora, humilde y muy dedicada a su familia, su labor día a día es cuidar de sus cultivos, ya que estos son los que generan los ingresos necesarios para el sostenimiento de su hogar.
Su deseo es ampliar sus cultivos, pero no cuenta con un buen capital, es por esto que solicita un préstamo el cual lo invertirá en semillas de plátano, yuca, maíz y cerdos para la cría y venta de ganado.

Su meta es continuar trabajando, remodelar su vivienda y brindarle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
Para esto cuenta con la ayuda de la Corporación Interactuar y las  buenas personas como lo son los colaboradores del portal Kiva.
texts.en:
Aida is a 44 year-old woman, married and the mother of five grown children.

Hardworking, humble and very devoted to her family, her day-to-day work is taking care of her crops, as they are what generate the income necessary to maintain her household.

Her desire is to expand her crops, but she lacks capital. For this reason she is applying for a loan which she will invest in banana seeds, yucca, and corn, and pigs for the breeding and sale of livestock.

Her goal is to continue working, remodel her home and provide a better quality of life for her family.

For this she is counting on the help of the corporation Interactuar and of good people such as are those who collaborate with Kiva.

loans.use: invest in banana seeds, yucca, and corn, and pigs for the breeding and sale of livestock.

loans.name: Analyn

texts.en: Analyn is married and for the past ten years has fished to earn a living in the Philippines. She has applied for a 15,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy new fishing nets and gasoline for her boat’s motor. She’s continually working to save enough money to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy new fishing nets and gasoline for her boat’s motor.

loans.name: Mary Jane

texts.en:
Mary Jane is 36 years old and married with one child in school. For the past ten years she has operated a sari-sari, or small general store in the Philippines.

Mary Jane has applied for a 30,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy additional stock for her store such as canned goods, eggs and milk. Her hard work is directed toward providing a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional stock for her store such as canned goods, eggs and milk.

loans.name: Merlita

texts.en: Merlita is married and for the past six years has operated a water distribution station in the Philippines. She has applied for a 25,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy new equipment such as a water tank, pipes, etc. for her station. She’s always working hard to build up her business.

loans.use: to purchase new water refilling equipment, like water tank, pipe, etc

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to promote her business, and purchase office supplies, and the insurance she needs for her business.

loans.name: Isis Lisbeth

texts.es: Isis tiene la oportunidad de comprar un terreno donde existe una construcción avanzada de vivienda, necesita un crédito de $ 2.100 para completar el costo del terreno y de esta manera  obtener casa propia y a la vez mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en: Isis has the opportunity to buy a plot of land where there is an advanced home construction project. She needs a loan of $2100 to make up the rest of the cost of the land and in this way obtain her own house and at the same time improve the quality of life of her family.

loans.use: to buy a lot with improvements for a home.

loans.name: Nolasco De Jesus

texts.es:
El  señor Nolasco  tiene 43 años de edad, es padre de 7 hijos, vive con su esposa en una aldea de Trojes, su principal actividad es la ganadería y también se dedica al repasto de ganado.
Don Nolasco esta solicitando el préstamo para la compra de una planta solar ya que su comunidad no poseen el servio de alumbrado eléctrico y con esta inversión estaría contribuyendo a mejorar su calidad de vida y tambien a cuidar el medio ambiente.
Don Nolasco uno de sus sueños es tener energia electrica y con esta inversion espera poder realizarlo, gracias al prestamo que se le brinde.
 
Trojes, Honduras – Abril del  2015
texts.en:
Nolasco is 43 years old, is the father of 7 children, and lives with his wife in the small town of Trojes. His primary work is in livestock, and he also works in cattle grazing. 

Nolasco is requesting the loan to purchase a solar energy system, because in his community the people do not have electric lighting. With this investment, he will be contributing to improving his quality of life, and also will be protecting the environment.

One of Nolasco's dreams is to have electricity, and with this investment he hopes to make it happen, thanks for the loan that is being offered to him.

Trojes, Hondoras - April 2015

loans.use: for the purchase of a solar energy system for his house.

loans.name: Las Poderosas Group

texts.es:
Los socios pertenecen al banco comunal “LAS PODEROSAS”; Este banco se ubicada en el distrito de Santa Ana, perteneciente a la provincia de La Convención y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Antonieta ella es soltera y tiene 25 años y tiene 2 hijos; La socia trabaja en su negocio de cultivo de frutas, la socia tiene un terreno donde cultiva plátanos, café, mandarinas y naranjas, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m, la socia ya tiene varios años en este negocio y le va muy bien, el sueño de la socia es ampliar su terreno de cultivo. La socia solicita le crédito para comprar semillas y fertilizantes.

Los otros socios se dedican al negocio de venta de animales, negocio de agricultura, negocio de tienda de abarrotes y negocio de venta de comida.



La socia agradece a quienes forman parte de este sueño mediante este medio y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas en el plazo establecido.
texts.en:
These are the members of the communal bank, “Las Poderosas”. This bank is located in the district of Santa Ana, which belongs to the province of La Convención and the department of Cusco. 

Señora Antonieta, a member, is 25 years old and single, with two children. She works in her fruit-growing business. She has a piece of land where she grows bananas, coffee, mandarins, and oranges; and she works from 6:00 AM until 5:00 PM.  She has been in this business for several years now, and it is going very well for her.  Her dream is to expand her fields.  She is requesting a loan to purchase seed and fertilizer. 

The other members have businesses such as animal sales, agriculture, a grocery store, and food sales.

This member thanks those who form a part of this dream in this way, and she is committed to making her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase seed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda is 55 years old and married with six children. For the past eight years she has operated a sari-sari, or small general store in the Philippines.

Nilda has applied for a 15,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy merchandise for her store such as shampoo, soap, milk, sugar, egg, noodles, etc. She works hard to build up her business so as to ensure her family’s financial stability.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her store

loans.name: Parviz

texts.ru:
Парвиз из древнего города Истаравшан. Он родился и вырос  в семьи рабочего. Парвиз женат и имеет  шестеро детей и троих внуков. У него очень дружная большая семья.  Парвиз мастер ремонту домов. Его сыновья пошли по стопам отца. 
Он построил дом для своего старшего сына. И теперь хочет установить пластиковые окна и двери. Так как они сохраняют тепло в зимнее время. Но у него не хватает собственных средств. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд за кредитом. Он заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Parviz is from the ancient town of Istaravshan. He was born and raised in a working class family. Parviz is married and has six children and three grandchildren. He has a very tight-knit, large family. Parviz is a home renovation contractor. His sons have followed in their fathers' footsteps.

He has built a house for his eldest son, and now he wants to install vinyl windows and doors because they retain heat during winter. But he does not have enough of his own funds. He has therefore applied to Arvand for a loan. He thanks Arvand in advance for its support and trust.

loans.use: to install vinyl windows and doors in his house.

loans.name: Ana

texts.en:
Ana, 59, is a widow with seven children, one of whom is in school. For the past 52 years Ana has operated a sari-sari, or small general store in the Philippines

Ana has applied for a 20,000 PHP loan through Kiva's field partner NWTF to buy additional merchandise to sell such as soap, milk, sugar, eggs, canned goods, etc. She is always working hard to build up her business so as to ensure her family’s financial stability.

loans.use: to buy additional merchandise to sell in her sari-sari

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: buy animal feed.

loans.name: Gulnoza

texts.ru:
Гулноза молодая и жизнерадостная женщина. Её 38 лет. Она замужем и имеет пятерых детей.  У неё высшее образование. Она работает учительницей в средней школе. Она хорошая жена и любящая мать. Её муж работает на стройке разнорабочим. 
 Гулноза хочет сделать ремонт и установить пластиковые окна и двери в своем доме. Но у неё не хватает собственных средств. Поэтому она обратилась в Арванд за кредитом. Гулноза заранее благодарит  Арванд  за поддержку и доверие.
texts.en:
Gulnoza is a young and cheerful woman. She is 38 years old. She is married and has five children. She has a higher education. She works as a secondary school teacher. She is a good wife and loving mother. Her husband works in construction as a laborer.

Gulnoza wants to renovate and install vinyl windows and doors in her house, but she does not have enough of her own funds so she has applied to Arvand for a loan. Gulnoza thanks Arvand in advance for its trust and support.

loans.use: to install vinyl doors and windows.

loans.name: Olbin Gustavo

texts.es:
El señor Olbin  tiene 21 años de edad, todavia no es padre de familia y vive con su esposa,  su actividad es la ganaderia y tambien se dedica a cultivar café y para este año espera tener muy  buena produccion de café.
Don Olbin su finca  esta ubicada en una aldea de Trojes, esta solictando el prestamo para la compra de una planta solar debido a que en la comunidad don vive no tiene servicio de energia electrica y esta inversion le ayudada  a cumplir su sueño que es mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia.
Don Olbin tambien quiere contribuir a la proteccion del ambiente y sabe que la compra de esta planta solar lo estaria haciendo.

 Trojes, Honduras -  Junio del  2015
texts.en:
Olbin is 21 years old. He is not yet a parent, and lives with his wife. He works with livestock, and he also cultivates coffee. This year, he expects to have very good coffee production.

Olbin's farm is located in the small town of Trojes. He is requesting the loan for the purchase of a solar energy system for his house. This is because the community where he lives does not have electricity service, and this investment will help him fulfill his dream to improve living conditions for his family.

Olbin also wants to contribute to the protection of the environment, and knows that the purchase of this solar electricity system will be doing that.

Trojes, Honduras - June 2015

loans.use: for the purchase of a solar energy system for his house.

loans.name: Aikanysh

texts.ru: Айканыш, 31 год, не замужем, мать 2 детей. У нее высшее образование, занимается торговлей женской одеждой для беременных на рынке города. Ее ежемесячная прибыль составляет в среднем 44,600 сом (KGS). Айканыш обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 150,000 сом (KGS) на покупку товара для увеличения товарооборота к осеннему сезону в магазине. Доходы она и дальше планирует вкладывать в развитие бизнеса, а также в ремонт дома.
texts.en: Aikanysh is 31 years old, unmarried, and the mother of two children. She has a higher education. She sells maternity clothing at the town market. Her monthly profit averages 44,600 som (KGS). Aikanysh has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 150,000 som (KGS) to buy goods to increase her store's stock for the autumn season. She plans to continue investing the proceeds in the development of the business, and also to renovate her house.

loans.use: to buy maternity clothing to sell in her store.

loans.name: Nodira

texts.ru:
Нодира жизнерадостная и ответственная женщина в возрасте 37 лет. Она замужем и имеет четырех детей. Вместе со своей семьёй Нодира живёт в сельской местности. Нодира работает швеёй.  Она очень любит детей, и старается обучать их от всего своего сердца, потому что она желает видеть образованных детей. Её муж работает на стройке разнорабочим. 
 В данное время Нодира вместе со своим мужем хотят достроить дом, где будут хорошие условия для проживания. Для этого Нодира обратилась в Арванд и хочет получить кредит на покупку строительных материалов для стройки дома. Она надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Nodira is a cheerful and responsible 37-year-old woman. She is married and has four children. Nodira and her family live in a rural location. Nodira works as a seamstress. She really loves her children, and is striving with all her heart to educate them, because she wishes to see her children educated. Her husband works as a laborer on a construction site.

At the present time Nodira and her husband would like to complete building a house where they will have good living conditions. For this, Nodira has applied to Arvand and wants to receive a loan to buy construction materials to build the house. She hopes for a positive results and thanks Arvand in advance for its support.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to finish building her house.

loans.name: Bakhtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиёр трудолюбивый мужчина из красивого города Курган-Тюбе. У него большая и дружная семья. У них в доме живут родители, его жена, братья и их жёны. Они помогают друг другу по дому. Бахтиёр занимается растениеводством. Основным источником дохода семьи является его деятельность. Это их наследственная работа. Бахтиёр уже собрал весенний урожай и сейчас ему нужно посадит новый. Он купил разные виды семян овощных культур, но ему не хватило денег на покупку минеральных удобрений. По этой причине он обратился за кредитом. Бахтиёр надеется на Вашу помощь.
texts.en: Bakhtiyor is a hard-working man from the beautiful town of Qurgan-Tube. Her has a large and tight-knit family. His parents, his wife, his brothers and their wives live in his house. They help each other around the house. Bakhtiyor grows crops. His activity is the main source of income for the family. It is work that they have inherited. Bakhtiyor has already gathered the spring harvest and now he needs to plant a new crop. He has bought various types of vegetable seeds, but he did not have enough money to buy mineral fertilizer. For this reason he has applied for a loan. Bakhtiyor hopes for your support.

loans.use: to buy mineral fertilizer.

loans.name: Christopher

texts.en:
Christopher is the proud owner of Knockerball Alabama, a fun, new engaging sport that has recently hit America. He is excited to introduce this Australian sport to the state of Alabama.

A knocker ball is a large round ball chamber of air that players insert themselves into to protect their bodies. The game is a contact sport and the object of the knocker ball is to eliminate players from the designated playing circle by “knocking” other players.

“I am so excited because I am doing something different,” Christopher said. “Being a business owner is exciting to me, and the fact that I can introduce something new to my community makes me proud.”

As a new startup, Christopher is looking to purchase the proper sport licensing and the necessary sporting equipment to operate. He would also like to hire two employees to help support his business. With his loan, Christopher will not only be able to hire additional staff, but he’ll be able to help members of his community find new ways to get active.

loans.use: hire two employees and pay for a sports license.

loans.name: Salkyn

texts.ru: Салкын, 53 года, замужем. Салкын имеет высшее образование, по характеру очень спокойная и хозяйственная женщина. Она работает в библиотеке, также с 2011 года занимается животноводством и полеводством, начав этот бизнес с суммы 10,000 сом (KGS). Благодаря упорному труду Салкын, на сегодняшний день на 4,84 Га арендованной земли она выращивает фасоль и прочие овощи для реализации. Ежемесячный доход составляет около 22,000 сом (KGS). В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Салкын обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 80,000 сом (KGS) на покупку удобрений, лекарств для обработки и культивацию почвы, чтобы выращивать экологически-чистую фасоль. Доходы от кредита Салкын планирует вложить в дальнейшее увеличение своего бизнеса и улучшение благосостояния семьи.
texts.en: Salkyn is 53 years old and married. Salkyn has a higher education. By nature she is a very calm and house-proud woman. She works in a library, and she has also been rearing animals and growing crops since 2011, having started this business with a sum of 10,000 som (KGS). Thanks to Salkyn's hard work, today she grows beans and other vegetables for sale on 4.84 hectares of land. Her monthly income is about 22,000 som (KGS). In order to develop her business further, Salkyn has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 80,000 som (KGS) to buy fertilizer and treatments to cultivate her land in order to grow organic beans. Salkyn plans to invest the proceeds of the loan in growing her business further and improving her family's well-being.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and treatments to cultivate her land and grow organic beans.

loans.name: Nasgul

texts.ru: Насгул, 44 года, не замужем, есть дочь. Около 15 лет назад начала бизнес по торговле строительными товарами на рынке города. На сегодняшний день у нее в обороте есть товар на сумму 400,000 сом (KGS). Среднемесячная прибыль составляет до 24,700 сом (KGS). Насгул обратилась в Банк «Бай-Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 120,000 сом (KGS) на покупку строительных материалов для обновления ассортимента. Доходы от кредита позволят Насгул улучшить ее благосостояние, развить бизнес и отремонтировать квартиру.
texts.en: Nasgul is 44 years old, unmarried, and has a daughter. She started a business selling construction goods at the city market about 15 years ago. Today she has goods in stock worth 400,000 som (KGS). Her average monthly profit is up to 24,700 som (KGS). Nasgul has applied to Bai Tushum Bank for a loan of 120,000 som (KGS) to buy construction materials to refresh her product range. The proceeds of the loan will enable Nasgul to improve her well-being, develop her business and renovate her apartment.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to sell in her store.

loans.name: Joash

texts.en:
As a father, the great desire to see all his children grow up to be professionals is what fills Joash with enthusiasm and inspiration. He is 48 years old and works tirelessly to raise animals. Through these humble tasks, he aspires to offer all of his children a university education.

Joash learned to do farm work at a young age, thanks to his parents. He has a tiny plot of land to live off, just under half an acre, and has always struggled to support his family. For over five years his income source has been from selling milk, poultry, and vegetables. He supplements the meager income by doing other personal business. Joash passionately loves dairy farming. Milking and feeding his own cow is the most enjoyable part about farming. He is very appreciative that dairy farming has been able to sustain farmers in his village. Milk, poultry and vegetables are very perishable, and these products require timely delivery to the market, but one problem that he faces is delivering to the market on time. Kitale area has a poor road network and poor feeder roads that really hamper timely delivery of products to the market.

That is why Joash is kindly seeking a loan to buy a motorbike. Farmers like Joash use motorbikes to transport passengers and farm goods to and from the market. They are suited for areas with poor road networks, which are inaccessible by cars. They are also very cheap to acquire and maintain.

Invest in Joash’s future and you won't regret it. He is full of promise. So far, he has managed to send his children to standard private schools with his blood, sweat, and tears. Imagine what he will do with your lending?

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Alayla Beleida

texts.es: Alayla se dedica a la venta de ropa y otros artículos. Ella solicita un préstamo de ₡ 1 050 000, este dinero lo usará para la compra de más mercadería  , esto con el fin de aumentar el volumen de sus ventas y de esta manera mejorar los ingresos de su hogar.
texts.en: Alayla makes her living selling clothing and other things.  She seeks a loan of 1,050,000 Costa Rica colones (CRC).  The money will be used to buy more merchandise, with the goal of increasing her sales and thereby improving the income of her home.

loans.use: to buy clothing to sell.

loans.name: Kuña Guapa Group

texts.es:
El comité KUÑA GUAPA, es un grupo nuevo  y numeroso que se formó en la Ciudad de Santaní, integradas por 24 señoras trabajadoras e independientes, que provienen de una zona rural, de difícil acceso, y de vida rural y muy dura.
La Sra. LEOPOLDINA es integrante de este comité, es una señora bastante activa, realiza una actividad excepcional digna de admirar, por la tarde noche se va por la chacra a buscar remedios naturales, lava, clasifica y las empaca para la venta. Se levanta a tempranas horas de la mañana a ofrecer sus remedios naturales a orillas de la calle, también prepara y vende mate, cocido y tereré, es muy conocida por los visitantes y camioneros de la zona.
Ella pide este préstamo para poder comprar remedios naturales para poder surtirse mejor y también para la compra de equipos para mate y terere para poder seguir con su trabajo.
texts.en:
The Kuña Guapa committee is a new, large group formed in the city of Santaní. There are 24 members, all hard-working and independent women. They are from a rural area that is difficult to access. They have a rural lifestyle that is very difficult.
Leopoldina is a member of this group. She is a very active woman. She has an admirable, dignified business. In the afternoon, she goes to the country to find natural remedies. She washes them, classifies them, and packs them for sale. She also prepares and sells mate, food, and traditional drinks. She is well-known by the visitors and pedestrians in the area.
She is requesting a loan to purchase natural remedies in order to have a better stock. She will also purchase materials for making mate and remedies so she can continue with her work.

loans.use: to buy natural remedies, as well as  equipment for making traditional drinks.

loans.name: Joséphine Clarice

texts.fr:
Âgée de 34 ans, mariée, Joséphine Clarice a deux enfants de 8 et 15 ans, scolarisés dans des écoles privées. Elle dirige un stand d'alimentation depuis 2000 et elle vise à développer cette activité. Elle voudrait que son stand devienne un restaurant un jour. C'est une femme travailleuse et débrouillarde. A chaque rentrée scolaire, c'est à dire pendant les mois d'août et septembre, elle profite de vendre des fournitures scolaires, à part le gargote pour augmenter le revenu.
Son objectif est de construire sa propre maison, car actuellement, la famille loue la maison d'habitation. Elle a déjà acquis un terrain avec son épargne.
texts.en:
34 years old and married, Joséphine Clarice has two children, who are 8 and 15 years old and both in private schools. She has been managing a food stand since 2000 and she aims to develop this business.

One day, she would like for her stand to become a restaurant. She is a hard-working and resourceful woman. At the beginning of every school year (August, September), she takes advantage and sells school supplies aside from her food stand to increase her earnings.

Her goal is to build her own house, since her family currently rents the house where they live. She has already acquired a piece of land with her savings.

loans.use: to buy meat, fish, legumes, and 1 sack of rice.

loans.name: Kipkosgei

texts.en:
Kipkosgei is a smallholder farmer from a rural home in Bomet Kenya. Dairy farming to Kipkosgei is not only a source of income, but also a livelihood. He has been doing dairy farming for years and he is still committed to the growth of his farm.

Kipkosgei is seeking a loan to buy a dairy cow. He plans to spend a small part of the loan amount on the cow’s insurance as a risk-mitigating measure to protect his family from slipping further into debt or poverty in the event the cow dies.

The impact this loan will have on Kipkosgei and his family includes financial inclusion, business growth, capital accumulation, and increased income. His ultimate goal is to elevate the living standards of his family.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Eva

texts.en:
Eva is married and she has one child. She started her business in 2011 with her own working capital of $500. She has an idea to request a loan of $1000 from Tuba Rai Metin to improve her management, because she says with borrowed money she can count the income and expenditures in one day.

She is selling blocks and she is taking this loan because she wants to buy more cement, sand and other materials to use. She has been busy with her business and she is happy to do that. She also cultivates animals like cows, pigs, and chickens.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand and other materials to use.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.es:
La socia Teresa alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al  negocio de crianza de animales menores como cuyes y gallinas, la socia es una persona responsable y empeñosa, la socia lleva  años que se dedica a la negocio y le va muy bien gracias al empeño que le pone a su negocio, la socia desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar cuyes entre otros.
La socia  agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Teresa alternates her daily activities with her business, which is that of raising small animals such as guinea pigs and chickens. She is a responsible and committed individual. She has been running this business for many years and it is going very well for her thanks to the effort that she puts into it. She wants to be able to continue working so that she can keep supporting her family.

She is asking for the loan so she can buy guinea pigs and other animals.

She is grateful and appreciates the loan. She is committed to complying with her loan repayment schedule in a responsible way.

loans.use: to buy guinea pigs and other animals

loans.name: Luzminda

texts.en:
Luzminda learned about Paglaum Multi Purpose Cooperative and the financial assistance it extends. She tried her luck doing a business focusing on her farming activities. She feels she owes her fortune to the Cooperative for having trusted her with the money she used as capital.

Luzminda borrowed another amount to pay for seedlings and compost. This will help give her farming income a big boost. Luzminda looks for better business opportunities and would love to be in the position to help others

loans.use: to pay for seedlings and compost.

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.es:
Jennifer es una mujer con 28 años de edad, con su esfuerzo y dedicación logro montar su primer  negocio, un taller de confecciones el cual ubico en la sala de la casa donde reside, esta actividad la aprendió gracias a las enseñanzas de su madre. Con esto ha logrado salir adelante con su dos hijos pequeños, los cuales los abandono su padre desde hace poco.

Actualmente se encuentra solicitando un crédito el cual lo invertirá en la compra de una maquina plana, hilos, botones y tela de alta costura, con esto espera aumentar sus clientes y de tal manera sus ingresos.

Su propósito es continuar trabajando para cumplir el sueño de pagar la educación de sus hijos y más adelante comprarse una vivienda propia.
texts.en:
Jennifer is a 28 year old woman. With her effort and dedication, she was able to open her first business, a sewing workshop, which she runs out of the living room of her home. She learned this trade thanks to her mother's lessons. This way, she has been able to get ahead with her two small children, who were recently abandoned by their father.

Currently, she is requesting a loan that she will use to invest in the purchase of a flat-bed sewing machine, thread, buttons, and high fashion fabrics. With these, she hopes to increase her customer base, and that way increasing her income.

Her goal is to continue working to achieve her dream of paying for her children's education, and later on, purchasing her own home.

loans.use: to buy a flat-bed sewing machine, thread, buttons, and high fashion fabrics

loans.name: Kelyn Lisseth

texts.es: Kelyn tiene 23 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto a su compañero de vida y su pequeña hija de 2 años de edad. Ella se dedica al comercio de tienda desde hace ya varios años. El negocio está ubicado en su casa de habitación y además es  una zona muy estratégica ya que es muy transitada, en especial la tienda de Kelyn ya que gracias a su carisma ha sabido ganarse la confianza de muchas personas en la zona donde habita.  Kelyn tiene muchas ideas de negocio las cuales poco a poco va poniendo en marcha. Su sueño es seguir manteniendo activo su negocio por mucho tiempo, por lo que siempre trata de mantenerse un paso adelante de la competencia y es así como ha sabido ganarse la confianza de sus vecinos los cuales manifiestan estar satisfechos con el servicio prestado. Es por esta razón que  ha tomado la decisión de  solicitar este crédito a FUSAI para poder invertir en su tienda y abastecerla con todo tipo de productos como: frijoles, azúcar, arroz, leche, golosinas, aceite, papel para baño, detergente, y de más productos que permitan atraer a más clientes.
texts.en:
Keyln, age 23, lives in her own house with her life partner and her little two year old daughter. She has had a store for several years. The business is located at her house, and it is a very strategic area. Keyln's store is very busy because, thanks to her charisma, she has known how to win the trust of a lot of people in the area where she lives.

Kelyn has a lot of business ideas, which little by little, she is putting into effect. Her dream is to continue keeping her business active for a long time. Therefore, she always tries to keep a step ahead of the competition. This is how she has known how to win the confidence of her neighbors, who say they are happy with her service.

It is for this reason that she has made the decision to request this loan from FUSAI in order to be able to invest in her store and stock it with all types of products. She will stock it with products like beans, sugar, rice, milk, sweets, cooking oil, toilet paper, detergent, and other products that will allow her to attract more customers.

loans.use: to buy beans, sugar, rice, milk, sweets, cooking oil, toilet paper, detergent, and more products for her store.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
As a married parent of five children, Marilou works hard to support her family. She has a rice farming business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from buying and selling rice. Marilou is borrowing PHP 25,000 through NWTF to pay for the laborers’ salaries for the farm preparation for her rice farming business.

She successfully paid back her previous loan, and now she has requested an additional loan to further build her business. Marilou has been sustaining her business activities through her past 24 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream, to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: to pay for the laborers' salaries for the farm preparation.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a smallholder farmer from a rural home in Siongiroi, Kenya. Dairy farming to Stephen is not only a source of income, but also a livelihood. He has been doing dairy farming for years and he is still committed to the growth of his farm.

Stephen is seeking a loan to buy a dairy cow. He plans to spend a small part of the loan amount on the cow’s insurance as a risk-mitigating measure to protect his family from slipping further into debt or poverty in the event the cow dies.

The impact this loan will have on Stephen and his family includes financial inclusion, business growth, capital accumulation, and increased income. His ultimate goal is to elevate the living standards of his family.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Mar-Alex

texts.en:
Mar-Alex' business involvement has been in transportation. He started this business in 1998. His wife is an Overseas Filipino Worker (OFW). The couple has been blessed with two children.

Mar-Alex would like to change the oil and buy a magneto kit and battery for his motorcycle transport. That's why his is seeking a loan of PHP 10,000. He hopes that he could obtain this amount of loan. In this way, he could secure all his passengers well and maintain his transportation business.

He will be grateful if his requested loan is approved.

loans.use: to change the oil and buy a magneto kit and battery for his motorcycle transport.

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is a smallholder farmer from a rural home in Bomet, Kenya. Dairy farming to Julius is not only a source of income, but also a livelihood. He has been doing dairy farming for years and he is still committed to the growth of his farm.

Julius is seeking a loan from Kiva lenders to buy a dairy cow. He plans to spend a small part of the loan amount on the cow’s insurance as a risk-mitigating measure to protect his family from slipping further into debt or poverty in the event the cow dies.

The impact this loan will have on Julius and his family includes financial inclusion, business growth, capital accumulation, and increased income. His ultimate goal is to elevate the living standards of his family.

loans.use: to buy a dairy cow.

loans.name: Evalina

texts.en:
Evalina is requesting a loan of $1000 from Tuba Rai Metin to buy additional supplies to keep in her store, including biscuits, hand & body lotions, cigarettes, shampoo, balms, ointments, temple oils, toothpaste, milk, detergents, soft drinks and other things to sell.

There are seven members in the family with her 5 children and including her husband. She has been doing business since 2007 with her own working capital of $500.

She wants to open a big store in the future, so she is taking this loan to improving her management of her business.

loans.use: to buy biscuits, hand & body lotions, cigarettes, shampoo, balms, ointments, temple oils, toothpaste, milk, detergents, soft drinks and other things to sell.

loans.name: Gerardo

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “Siempre Juntos”.
El socio Gerardo alterna sus actividades diarias dedicándose al negocio de elaboración de colchones, el socio agradece y valora el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas mensuales con mucha responsabilidad, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para  de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia, él socio continua vendiendo los colchones a sus clientes que le solicitan, el socio desea poder seguir trabajando para de esta forma seguir apoyando a su familia.
El socio solicita el crédito para la compra de resortes, espumas entre otros.
texts.en:
